 819  8C86                  include "./Universe/StarRoutines.asm"
# file opened: ./Universe/StarRoutines.asm
   1+ 8C86              ;note: DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC as per
   2+ 8C86              ;                                   BC = A0
   3+ 8C86              ;                                   DE = 0C
   4+ 8C86              ;                                   so BC = a * 256 / C
   5+ 8C86
   6+ 8C86              ; We can cheat here, Speed is always 0 or positive
   7+ 8C86              ; z postion will always be positive if we can see it
   8+ 8C86
   9+ 8C86 EB           InitStarAtHL:           ex      de,hl
  10+ 8C87 CD 0F 98                             call    doRND
  11+ 8C8A EB                                   ex      de,hl
  12+ 8C8B F6 08                                or      8
  13+ 8C8D 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  14+ 8C8E E6 7F                                and     $7F
  15+ 8C90 23                                   inc     hl
  16+ 8C91 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  17+ 8C92 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  18+ 8C93 CD 0F 98                             call    doRND
  19+ 8C96 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  20+ 8C97 0F                                   rrca
  21+ 8C98 E6 80                                and     $80
  22+ 8C9A B6                                   or      (hl)
  23+ 8C9B 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  24+ 8C9C 23                                   inc     hl
  25+ 8C9D EB                                   ex      de,hl
  26+ 8C9E CD 0F 98                             call    doRND
  27+ 8CA1 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  28+ 8CA2 F6 04                                or      4
  29+ 8CA4 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  30+ 8CA5 23                                   inc     hl
  31+ 8CA6 E6 7F                                and     $7F
  32+ 8CA8 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  33+ 8CA9 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  34+ 8CAA CD 0F 98                             call    doRND
  35+ 8CAD EB                                   ex      de,hl
  36+ 8CAE 0F                                   rrca
  37+ 8CAF E6 80                                and     $80
  38+ 8CB1 B6                                   or      (hl)
  39+ 8CB2 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  40+ 8CB3 23                                   inc     hl
  41+ 8CB4 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  42+ 8CB5 CD 0F 98                             call    doRND
  43+ 8CB8 EB                                   ex      de,hl
  44+ 8CB9 F6 90                                or      144
  45+ 8CBB 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  46+ 8CBC 23                                   inc     hl
  47+ 8CBD F6 70                                or      %01110000
  48+ 8CBF E6 7F                                and     $7f     ; bodge
  49+ 8CC1 77                                   ld      (hl),a
  50+ 8CC2 23                                   inc     hl
  51+ 8CC3 C9                                   ret
  52+ 8CC4
  53+ 8CC4              ; we could cheat, flip the sign of DE and just add but its not very optimised
  54+ 8CC4 7C           StarsSUBHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ 8CC5 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ 8CC7 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ 8CC8 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ 8CC9                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite therefore we can add
  58+ 8CC9 FA F7 8C    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDEOppSGN
  59+ 8CCC 78           .SUBHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
  60+ 8CCD B2                                   or      d
  61+ 8CCE                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ 8CCE FA D8 8C    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameNeg
  62+ 8CD1 B7                                   or      a
  63+ 8CD2 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  64+ 8CD4                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  64+ 8CD4 FA EB 8C    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  65+ 8CD7 C9                                   ret
  66+ 8CD8 7C           .SUBHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  67+ 8CD9 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  68+ 8CDB 67                                   ld      h,a
  69+ 8CDC 7A                                   ld      a,d
  70+ 8CDD E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  71+ 8CDF 57                                   ld      d,a
  72+ 8CE0 B7                                   or      a
  73+ 8CE1 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  74+ 8CE3                                      JumpIfNegative .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  74+ 8CE3 FA EB 8C    >                        jp		m, .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw
  75+ 8CE6 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  76+ 8CE7 F6 80                                or      SignOnly8Bit
  77+ 8CE9 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ 8CEA C9                                   ret
  79+ 8CEB              .SUBHLDESameOvrFlw:     NegHL
  79+ 8CEB AF          >                xor a
  79+ 8CEC 95          >                sub l
  79+ 8CED 6F          >                ld l,a
  79+ 8CEE 9F          >                sbc a,a
  79+ 8CEF 94          >                sub h
  79+ 8CF0 67          >                ld h,a
  80+ 8CF1 78                                   ld      a,b
  81+ 8CF2 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  82+ 8CF4 B4                                   or      h
  83+ 8CF5 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  84+ 8CF6 C9                                   ret
  85+ 8CF7 B7           .SUBHLDEOppSGN:         or      a
  86+ 8CF8 7C                                   ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  87+ 8CF9 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  88+ 8CFB 67                                   ld      h,a
  89+ 8CFC 7A                                   ld      a,d
  90+ 8CFD E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  91+ 8CFF 57                                   ld      d,a
  92+ 8D00 19                                   add     hl,de
  93+ 8D01 78                                   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  94+ 8D02 B4                                   or      h
  95+ 8D03 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  96+ 8D04 C9                                   ret
  97+ 8D05
  98+ 8D05 7C           StarsADDHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  99+ 8D06 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
 100+ 8D08 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
 101+ 8D09 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
 102+ 8D0A                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
 102+ 8D0A FA 22 8D    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
 103+ 8D0D 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:      ld      a,b
 104+ 8D0E B2                                   or      d
 105+ 8D0F                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
 105+ 8D0F FA 14 8D    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
 106+ 8D12 19                                   add     hl,de
 107+ 8D13 C9                                   ret
 108+ 8D14 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:        ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 109+ 8D15 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 110+ 8D17 67                                   ld      h,a
 111+ 8D18 7A                                   ld      a,d
 112+ 8D19 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 113+ 8D1B 57                                   ld      d,a
 114+ 8D1C 19                                   add     hl,de
 115+ 8D1D 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
 116+ 8D1F B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
 117+ 8D20 67                                   ld      h,a
 118+ 8D21 C9                                   ret
 119+ 8D22 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:         ld      a,h                         ; here HL and DE are opposite  so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
 120+ 8D23 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
 121+ 8D25 67                                   ld      h,a
 122+ 8D26 7A                                   ld      a,d
 123+ 8D27 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
 124+ 8D29 57                                   ld      d,a
 125+ 8D2A B7                                   or      a
 126+ 8D2B ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
 127+ 8D2D 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
 128+ 8D2F 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:  ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
 129+ 8D30 B4                                   or      h
 130+ 8D31 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
 131+ 8D32 C9                                   ret
 132+ 8D33              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:      NegHL
 132+ 8D33 AF          >                xor a
 132+ 8D34 95          >                sub l
 132+ 8D35 6F          >                ld l,a
 132+ 8D36 9F          >                sbc a,a
 132+ 8D37 94          >                sub h
 132+ 8D38 67          >                ld h,a
 133+ 8D39 78                                   ld      a,b
 134+ 8D3A EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
 135+ 8D3C B4                                   or      h
 136+ 8D3D 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
 137+ 8D3E C9                                   ret
 138+ 8D3F              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 139+ 8D3F 06 0B        InitialiseStars:        ld      b,MaxNumberOfStars
 140+ 8D41 78                                   ld      a,b
 141+ 8D42 32 51 95                             ld      (NumberOfStarsNOSTM),a
 142+ 8D45 21 9E 96                             ld      hl,varDust
 143+ 8D48 CD 86 8C     InitStarsLoop:          call    InitStarAtHL
 144+ 8D4B 10 FB                                djnz    InitStarsLoop
 145+ 8D4D C9                                   ret
 146+ 8D4E              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 147+ 8D4E              StarsForward:          ; break
 148+ 8D4E 3A 51 95                             ld      a,(NumberOfStarsNOSTM)
 149+ 8D51 47                                   ld      b,a                                 ; get the number of stars to process
 150+ 8D52 FD 21 9E 96                          ld      iy,varDust                          ; hl is now a pointer to the dust array
 151+ 8D56 C5           StarProcessLoop:        push    bc                                  ; save counter +1
 152+ 8D57 FD 7E 05     .Qequ64XSpeedDivZHi:    ld      a,(iy+5)
 153+ 8D5A 5F                                   ld      e,a
 154+ 8D5B 16 00                                ld      d,0                                 ; de = zhi/256
 155+ 8D5D 3A 4C 94                             ld      a,(DELTA)
 156+ 8D60 FE 00                                cp      0
 157+ 8D62 20 01                                jr      nz,.NormalSpeed
 158+ 8D64 3C                                   inc     a                                   ; so the is at lest some dust movement
 159+ 8D65 47           .NormalSpeed:           ld      b,a
 160+ 8D66 0E 00                                ld      c,0                                 ; bc = delta * 256
 161+ 8D68 CD C6 A3                             call    BC_Div_DE                           ; BC = BC.DE , HL = remainder
 162+ 8D6B                                      ShiftHLRight1
 162+ 8D6B CB 3C       >			   srl h
 162+ 8D6D CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 163+ 8D6F                                      ShiftHLRight1                               ; hl = remainder/2 so now 64 * speed / zhi
 163+ 8D6F CB 3C       >			   srl h
 163+ 8D71 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
 164+ 8D73 7D                                   ld      a,l                                 ;
 165+ 8D74 F6 01                                or      1                                   ; so ensure A is at least 1 for ambient movement
 166+ 8D76 DD 6F                                ld      ixl,a                               ; preserve A which is also VarQ = 64 * speed / zhi
 167+ 8D78 FD 6E 04 FD  .ZequZMinusSpeedX64:    ld      hl,(iy+4)                           ; hl = z
 167+ 8D7C 66 05
 168+ 8D7E ED 5B 4D 94                          ld      de, (DELTA4)                         ; de = delta4 i.e. speed * 64 pre computed
 169+ 8D82 CD C4 8C                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned
 170+ 8D85                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,ResetStar
 170+ 8D85 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
 170+ 8D87 C2 DC 8E    >                        jp      nz,ResetStar
 171+ 8D8A FD 75 04 FD                          ld      (iy+4),hl
 171+ 8D8E 74 05
 172+ 8D90 FD 6E 00 FD  .XEquXPlusXhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; hl  = x
 172+ 8D94 66 01
 173+ 8D96 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 174+ 8D97 E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 175+ 8D99 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(x hi)
 176+ 8D9A DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 177+ 8D9C ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(x hi) * Q
 178+ 8D9E 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 179+ 8D9F E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 180+ 8DA1 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 181+ 8DA2 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 182+ 8DA3 CD 05 8D                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; x = x + (x hi/256 * Q)
 183+ 8DA6 7C                                   ld      a,h
 184+ 8DA7 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 185+ 8DA9                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $70, ResetStar
 185+ 8DA9 FE 70       >                        cp     $70
 185+ 8DAB D2 DC 8E    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 186+ 8DAE FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl                           ;
 186+ 8DB2 74 01
 187+ 8DB4 FD 6E 02 FD  .YEquYPlusYhiMulQ       ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; hl  = y
 187+ 8DB8 66 03
 188+ 8DBA 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 189+ 8DBB E6 7F                                and     $7F                                 ;
 190+ 8DBD 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; d = abs(y hi)
 191+ 8DBE DD 5D                                ld      e,ixl                               ; e = Q = 64 * speed / zhi
 192+ 8DC0 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de =  abs(y hi) * Q
 193+ 8DC2 7C                                   ld      a,h                                 ;
 194+ 8DC3 E6 80                                and     $80                                 ;
 195+ 8DC5 B2                                   or      d                                   ; set sign bit in d
 196+ 8DC6 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ;
 197+ 8DC7 CD 05 8D                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; y = y + (x hi/256 * Q)
 198+ 8DCA 7C                                   ld      a,h
 199+ 8DCB E6 7F                                and     $7F
 200+ 8DCD                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60, ResetStar
 200+ 8DCD FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 200+ 8DCF D2 DC 8E    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 201+ 8DD2 7C                                   ld      a,h
 202+ 8DD3 E6 80                                and     $80
 203+ 8DD5 20 06                                jr      nz,.NoSecondCheck
 204+ 8DD7 7C                                   ld      a,h
 205+ 8DD8                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $20, ResetStar
 205+ 8DD8 FE 20       >                        cp     $20
 205+ 8DDA D2 DC 8E    >                        jp		nc,ResetStar
 206+ 8DDD FD 75 02 FD  .NoSecondCheck:         ld      (iy+2),hl                           ;
 206+ 8DE1 74 03
 207+ 8DE3              ; Now roll
 208+ 8DE3              ;  6. x = x - alpha * y / 256
 209+ 8DE3 2A 0F 94     .XRoll:                 ld      hl,(ALP1)                           ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 210+ 8DE6 7D                                   ld      a,l
 211+ 8DE7 FE 00                                cp      0
 212+ 8DE9 28 4C                                jr      z,.NoRoll                           ; don;t roll if magnitude is 0
 213+ 8DEB                                      ;break
 214+ 8DEB                                      ;ld      a,$80
 215+ 8DEB                                      ;xor     l                                   ; l = flipped sign as we are rotating stars not us
 216+ 8DEB E5                                   push    hl
 217+ 8DEC 7C                                   ld      a,h
 218+ 8DED E6 80                                and     $80
 219+ 8DEF 4F           .rxSaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 220+ 8DF0 55           .rxDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 221+ 8DF1 FD 7E 03                             ld      a,(iy+3)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 222+ 8DF4 5F                                   ld      e,a
 223+ 8DF5 E6 80                                and     $80
 224+ 8DF7 47           .rxBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 225+ 8DF8 7B           .rxEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 226+ 8DF9 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 227+ 8DFB 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 228+ 8DFC ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 229+ 8DFE 79                                   ld      a,c
 230+ 8DFF A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 231+ 8E00 B2                                   or      d
 232+ 8E01 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 233+ 8E02 FD 6E 00 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+0)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 233+ 8E06 66 01
 234+ 8E08 CD C4 8C                             call    StarsSUBHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 235+ 8E0B FD 75 00 FD                          ld      (iy+0),hl
 235+ 8E0F 74 01
 236+ 8E11              ;  5. y = y + alpha * x / 256
 237+ 8E11              .YRoll:                 ;break
 238+ 8E11 E1                                   pop     hl                                  ; h = sign, l = magnitude
 239+ 8E12 7C                                   ld      a,h
 240+ 8E13 E6 80                                and     $80
 241+ 8E15 4F           .rySaveAlphaSign:       ld      c,a                                 ; save alpha sign in c
 242+ 8E16 55           .ryDEquABSAlpha:        ld      d,l                                 ; d= abs (alpha)
 243+ 8E17 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)                            ; get high byte from x coord
 244+ 8E1A 5F                                   ld      e,a
 245+ 8E1B E6 80                                and     $80
 246+ 8E1D 47           .ryBEquSignXHi:         ld      b,a                                 ; save sign of x in b
 247+ 8E1E 7B           .ryEEquABSignX:         ld      a,e
 248+ 8E1F E6 7F                                and     $7F
 249+ 8E21 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; save abs x hi in e
 250+ 8E22 ED 30                                mul                                         ; abs(alpha) * abs(y high) (so /256)
 251+ 8E24 79                                   ld      a,c
 252+ 8E25 A8                                   xor     b                                   ; handle muliple sign bits
 253+ 8E26 B2                                   or      d
 254+ 8E27 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = signed alpha & y high / 256
 255+ 8E28 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)                           ; h = iy+1, l = iy+0
 255+ 8E2C 66 03
 256+ 8E2E CD 05 8D                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned                  ; we are usign add, so may need to fip sign?
 257+ 8E31 FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 257+ 8E35 74 03
 258+ 8E37 3A 02 94     .NoRoll:                ld      a,(BET1)
 259+ 8E3A FE 00                                cp      0
 260+ 8E3C 28 22                                jr      z,.NoPitch
 261+ 8E3E              ;  8. y = y - beta * 256
 262+ 8E3E 57           .YPitch:                ld      d,a                                 ; d = BET1
 263+ 8E3F FD 7E 02                             ld      a,(iy+2)
 264+ 8E42 5F                                   ld      e,a                                 ; e = Y HI
 265+ 8E43 ED 30                                mul                                         ; de = BET1 * YHi so now D = BETA & YHI / 256
 266+ 8E45 5F                                   ld      e,a
 267+ 8E46 ED 30                                mul                                         ; so now de = (BETA & Yhi) ^ 2
 268+ 8E48                                      ShiftDELeft1                                ; de = 2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2)
 268+ 8E48 CB 23       >			   sla e
 268+ 8E4A CB 12       >			   rl  d
 269+ 8E4C 3A 04 94                             ld      a,(BET2FLIP)                        ; get inverted Sign
 270+ 8E4F B2                                   or      d
 271+ 8E50 57                                   ld      d,a                                 ; de = - (2 * ((BETA & Yhi) ^ 2))
 272+ 8E51 FD 6E 02 FD                          ld      hl,(iy+2)
 272+ 8E55 66 03
 273+ 8E57 CD 05 8D                             call    StarsADDHLDESigned
 274+ 8E5A FD 75 02 FD                          ld      (iy+2),hl
 274+ 8E5E 74 03
 275+ 8E60              ; now work out screen pos
 276+ 8E60              ; Note two optimistations, write to layer 2 - we get a free removal via double buffer cls
 277+ 8E60              ; read z dept than determine hw many pixesl to plot, e.g. 1,2,3,4
 278+ 8E60              ;        pop     de
 279+ 8E60               ;       call    ProjectStarXToScreen
 280+ 8E60                                      ;pop     de
 281+ 8E60              .NoPitch:
 282+ 8E60 FD 7E 01     .ProjectStar:           ld      a,(iy+1)
 283+ 8E63 6F                                   ld      l,a
 284+ 8E64 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 285+ 8E66                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegXPt
 285+ 8E66 CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 285+ 8E68 C2 71 8E    >                        jp      nz,StarNegXPt
 286+ 8E6B C6 80                                add     a,$80
 287+ 8E6D 4F                                   ld      c,a
 288+ 8E6E C3 76 8E                             jp      StarDoneX
 289+ 8E71 47           StarNegXPt:             ld      b,a
 290+ 8E72 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 291+ 8E74 90                                   sub     b
 292+ 8E75 4F                                   ld      c,a
 293+ 8E76 FD 7E 03     StarDoneX:              ld      a,(iy+3)
 294+ 8E79 6F                                   ld      l,a
 295+ 8E7A E6 7F                                and     $7F
 296+ 8E7C                                      JumpOnBitSet l,7,StarNegYPt
 296+ 8E7C CB 7D       >                        bit 	7,l
 296+ 8E7E C2 87 8E    >                        jp      nz,StarNegYPt
 297+ 8E81 C6 60                                add     a,$60
 298+ 8E83 47                                   ld      b,a
 299+ 8E84 C3 8C 8E                             jp      StarDoneY
 300+ 8E87 47           StarNegYPt:             ld      b,a
 301+ 8E88 3E 60                                ld      a,$60
 302+ 8E8A 90                                   sub     b
 303+ 8E8B 47                                   ld      b,a
 304+ 8E8C 3E FC        StarDoneY:              ld      a,$FC
 305+ 8E8E C5                                   push    bc
 306+ 8E8F              .DrawStar:              MMUSelectLayer2
 306+ 8E8F ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 307+ 8E93 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 308+ 8E96 FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 309+ 8E99 C1                                   pop    bc
 310+ 8E9A                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $60,EndofStarsLoop
 310+ 8E9A FE 60       >                        cp     $60
 310+ 8E9C D2 CC 8E    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 311+ 8E9F 3E D8                                ld      a,$D8
 312+ 8EA1 0C                                   inc     c
 313+ 8EA2 C5                                   push    bc
 314+ 8EA3                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 314+ 8EA3 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 315+ 8EA7 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 316+ 8EAA FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 317+ 8EAD C1                                   pop    bc
 318+ 8EAE                                      JumpIfAGTENusng $37,EndofStarsLoop
 318+ 8EAE FE 37       >                        cp     $37
 318+ 8EB0 D2 CC 8E    >                        jp		nc,EndofStarsLoop
 319+ 8EB3 3E B4                                ld      a,$B4
 320+ 8EB5 04                                   inc     b
 321+ 8EB6 C5                                   push    bc
 322+ 8EB7                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 322+ 8EB7 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 323+ 8EBB CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 324+ 8EBE FD 7E 05                             ld      a,(iy+5)
 325+ 8EC1 C1                                   pop    bc
 326+ 8EC2 3E B4                                ld      a,$B4
 327+ 8EC4 0D                                   dec     c
 328+ 8EC5                                      MMUSelectLayer2
 328+ 8EC5 ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
 329+ 8EC9 CD FF E0                             call    l2_plot_pixel
 330+ 8ECC C1           EndofStarsLoop:         pop     bc                                      ;  0
 331+ 8ECD FD E5                                push    iy                                      ; +1
 332+ 8ECF E1                                   pop     hl                                      ;  0
 333+ 8ED0 ED 34 06 00                          add     hl,6
 334+ 8ED4 E5           NextStarLoop2:          push    hl                                      ; +1
 335+ 8ED5 FD E1                                pop     iy                                      ;  0
 336+ 8ED7 05                                   dec     b
 337+ 8ED8 C2 56 8D                             jp      nz,StarProcessLoop
 338+ 8EDB C9                                   ret
 339+ 8EDC              ResetStar:              ;break
 340+ 8EDC                                      ;pop     de
 341+ 8EDC C1                                   pop     bc                                      ; 0
 342+ 8EDD 3A 51 95                             ld      a,(NumberOfStarsNOSTM)
 343+ 8EE0 90                                   sub     b
 344+ 8EE1 57                                   ld      d,a
 345+ 8EE2 1E 06                                ld      e,6
 346+ 8EE4 ED 30                                mul
 347+ 8EE6 21 9E 96                             ld      hl,varDust
 348+ 8EE9 19                                   add     hl,de
 349+ 8EEA CD 86 8C                             call    InitStarAtHL
 350+ 8EED C3 D4 8E                             jp      NextStarLoop2
 351+ 8EF0              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 352+ 8EF0 FD 4E 00     ProjectStarXToScreen:   ld      c,(iy+0)
 353+ 8EF3 FD 7E 01                             ld      a,(iy+1)
 354+ 8EF6 6F                                   ld      l,a
 355+ 8EF7 E6 7F                                and     $7F
 356+ 8EF9 47                                   ld      b,a
 357+ 8EFA CD 69 A3                             call    DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 358+ 8EFD 7D                                   ld      a,l
 359+ 8EFE                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarXNegativePoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap
 359+ 8EFE CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 359+ 8F00 C2 0B 8F    >                        jp      nz,StarXNegativePoint
 360+ 8F03              ;StarXPositivePoint:									; x was positive result
 361+ 8F03 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX						;
 362+ 8F05 26 00                                ld          h,0
 363+ 8F07 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = Screen Centre + X
 364+ 8F08 C3 12 8F                             jp          StarStoreXPoint
 365+ 8F0B              StarXNegativePoint:                                 ; x < 0 so need to subtract from the screen centre position
 366+ 8F0B 2E 80                                ld          l,ScreenCenterX
 367+ 8F0D 26 00                                ld          h,0
 368+ 8F0F                                      ClearCarryFlag
 368+ 8F0F B7          >                        or a
 369+ 8F10 ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc                               ; hl = Screen Centre - X
 370+ 8F12              StarStoreXPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 371+ 8F12 7D                                   ld          a,l
 372+ 8F13 32 F6 96                             ld          (varStarX),a
 373+ 8F16 C9                                   ret
 374+ 8F17
 375+ 8F17 FD 46 02     ProjectStarYToScreen:   ld          b,(iy+2)
 376+ 8F1A FD 7E 03                             ld          a,(iy+3)
 377+ 8F1D 6F                                   ld          l,a
 378+ 8F1E E6 7F                                and         $7F
 379+ 8F20 47                                   ld          b,a
 380+ 8F21 CD 69 A3                             call        DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC
 381+ 8F24 7D                                   ld          a,l                                 ; XX15+2 \ sign of X dist
 382+ 8F25                                      JumpOnBitSet a,7,StarNegativeYPoint             ; LL62 up, -ve Xdist, RU screen onto XX3 heap top of screen is Y = 0
 382+ 8F25 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
 382+ 8F27 C2 32 8F    >                        jp      nz,StarNegativeYPoint
 383+ 8F2A                                  ;StarPositiveYPoint:									; Y is positive so above the centre line
 384+ 8F2A 2E 60                               ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 385+ 8F2C                                      ClearCarryFlag
 385+ 8F2C B7          >                        or a
 386+ 8F2D ED 42                                sbc         hl,bc  							 	; hl = ScreenCentreY - Y coord (as screen is 0 at top)
 387+ 8F2F C3 37 8F                             jp          StarStoreYPoint
 388+ 8F32              StarNegativeYPoint:									; this bit is only 8 bit aware TODO FIX
 389+ 8F32 2E 60                                ld          l,ScreenCenterY
 390+ 8F34 26 00                                ld          h,0
 391+ 8F36 09                                   add         hl,bc								; hl = ScreenCenterY + Y as negative is below the center of screen
 392+ 8F37              StarStoreYPoint:                                    ; also from LL62, XX3 node heap has xscreen node so far.
 393+ 8F37 7D                                   ld          a,l
 394+ 8F38 32 F7 96                             ld          (varStarY),a
 395+ 8F3B C9                                   ret

   1+ 8F3C              JumpIfObjectIsPlanet:   MACRO target
   2+ 8F3C ~                                    ld a,(UbnkHullCopy)
   3+ 8F3C ~                                    bit 7,a
   4+ 8F3C ~                                    jp  nz,target
   5+ 8F3C                                      ENDM
   6+ 8F3C
   7+ 8F3C              SetMaxVisibility:       MACRO
   8+ 8F3C ~                                    ld		a,MaxVisibility					; max visibility                                               ;;;; default max visibility
   9+ 8F3C ~                                    ld		(LastNormalVisible),a			; XX4                                                          ;;;;
  10+ 8F3C                                      ENDM
  11+ 8F3C
  12+ 8F3C              JumpIfObjectOutsideFov: MACRO target
  13+ 8F3C ~            LL10CheckXInFoV:
  14+ 8F3C ~                                    ld		hl, (INWKxlo)                   ; compare inkwk to to inwk z                                      ;    else
  15+ 8F3C ~                                    ld		de, (INWKzlo)                   ; we can compare as ABS given + or - extreems will be out of view ;         .
  16+ 8F3C ~                                    or		a							    ; clear carry flag for sbc                                        ;         .
  17+ 8F3C ~                                    sbc		hl,de                           ; FOV is 90degrees                                                ;         .
  18+ 8F3C ~                                    bit     7,h
  19+ 8F3C ~                                    jp      z,target                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  20+ 8F3C ~            LL10CheckYInFoV:
  21+ 8F3C ~                                    ld		hl, (INWKyLo)                                                                                     ;         .
  22+ 8F3C ~                                    or		a							    ; clear carry flag                                                ;         .
  23+ 8F3C ~                                    sbc		hl,de                           ; and test y axis, FOV is 90degrees                               ;         .
  24+ 8F3C ~                                    bit     7,h
  25+ 8F3C ~                                    jp      z,target                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  26+ 8F3C                                      ENDM
  27+ 8F3C
  28+ 8F3C              LL10AddGunNode:         MACRO
  29+ 8F3C ~                                    ld		a,(GunVertexAddr)	            ; Hull byte6, node gun*4 (Probably should be from bank            ;         hl = z / 8
  30+ 8F3C ~                                    ld		c,a                                                                                               ;         if zhi = 0
  31+ 8F3C ~                                    ld      b,0                             ; bc now - GunNode                                                ;                                              ;             GOTO LL13
  32+ 8F3C ~                                    ld		a,$FF						    ; flag on node heap at gun                                        ;          else
  33+ 8F3C ~                                    ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray                ; flag node on node heap                                          ;
  34+ 8F3C ~                                    add     hl,bc                           ; at position UBnkNodeArray[GunNode]
  35+ 8F3C ~            MakeBothGunNodesVisible:
  36+ 8F3C ~                                    ld      (hl),a                          ; made both gun line notes visible always
  37+ 8F3C ~                                    inc     hl                              ;
  38+ 8F3C ~                                    ld      (hl),a                          ;
  39+ 8F3C                                      ENDM
  40+ 8F3C
  41+ 8F3C              JumpIfTooFarAway:       MACRO   target
  42+ 8F3C ~                                    ld		hl,(UBnKzlo)                    ; hl = z position, by this point it must be positive
  43+ 8F3C ~                                    ShiftHLDiv8                             ; z position / 8
  44+ 8F3C ~                                    ld      a,h                             ;
  45+ 8F3C ~                                    IfANotZeroGoto target                       ; LL13 - hop as far , i.e. zhi not 0 after divide by 8
  46+ 8F3C                                      ENDM

  48+ 8F3C              DisplayObject:
  49+ 8F3C              LL9:										; Draw object in current bank                                  ;;;; Display object LL9
  50+ 8F3C                 ; DEBUG JumpIfObjectIsPlanet LL25

  53+ 8F3E 32 EA 93    >                        ld		(LastNormalVisible),a			; XX4                                                          ;;;;
  54+ 8F41              ;LL9TestRemoveShip:
  55+ 8F41              ;    JumpOnMemBitSet UbnkNweb,7,EraseOldLines; if bit 7 is set goto EraseOldLines                         ;;;;    goto EraseOldLines
  56+ 8F41              ; .................................................................................................................................
  57+ 8F41              LL9NoEraseLines:
  58+ 8F41                  JumpOnMemBitSet UBnkexplDsp,5,DoExplosionOrClear7 ; mask for bit 5, exploding, display explosion state|missiles  EE28 bit5 set, explosion ongoing
  58+ 8F41 3A 2A C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkexplDsp)
  58+ 8F44 CB 6F       >                        bit 	5,a
  58+ 8F46 C2 71 8F    >                        jp      nz,DoExplosionOrClear7
  59+ 8F49                  JumpOnBitClear a,7,DoExplosionOrClear7  ; we now have it in A so EE28 bit7 clear, else Start blowing up!                      ;;;;
  59+ 8F49 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
  59+ 8F4B CA 71 8F    >                        jp      z,DoExplosionOrClear7
  60+ 8F4E E6 3F        	and		$3F								; clear bits 7,6                                               ;;;; else
  61+ 8F50 32 2A C0     	ld		(UBnkexplDsp),a					; INWK+31                                                      ;;;;    clear bit 7 & 6 of INKW31
  62+ 8F53              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................
  63+ 8F53              LL9ZeroAccelRotCtr:
  64+ 8F53                  ldWriteZero UBnkAccel                   ; byte #28 accel (INF),Y                                       ;;;;    set UBnkAccel & UBnkrotZCounter to 0
  64+ 8F53 AF          >               xor      a
  64+ 8F54 32 27 C0    >               ld       (UBnkAccel),a
  65+ 8F57 32 29 C0     	ld		(UBnkrotZCounter),a				; byte #30 rotz counter (INF),Y                                ;;;;
  66+ 8F5A CD 03 CD     	call	EraseOldLines					; EE51 \ if bit3 set erase old lines in XX19 heap              ;;;;    gosub erase old lines (EE51)
  67+ 8F5D              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................
  68+ 8F5D              LL9SetExploRad:
  69+ 8F5D              	ldWriteConst 18,UbnKEdgeHeapCounter		; Counter for explosion radius                                 ;;;;    set explosion raidus XX19[1] to 18
  69+ 8F5D 3E 12       >               ld       a,18
  69+ 8F5F 32 F5 C2    >               ld       (UbnKEdgeHeapCounter),a
  70+ 8F62              	ldCopyByte ExplosionCtAddr,UbnkEdgeHeapBytes ; Hull byte#7 explosion of ship type e.g. &2A           ;;;;    set XX19 [2] to Explosion type for ship (i.e nbr of
  70+ 8F62 3A 05 C3    >               ld       a,(ExplosionCtAddr)
  70+ 8F65 32 F3 C2    >               ld       (UbnkEdgeHeapBytes),a
  71+ 8F68 CD 34 98         call    fillHeapRandom4Points                                                                          ;;;;    set first 4 bytes of XX19 Heap to random number      ::EE55
  72+ 8F6B 3A 13 C0         ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)                                                                                   ;;;;    set a to z pos sign
  73+ 8F6E C3 79 8F     	jp      ObjectInFront                                                                                  ;;;;    goto DoExplosion
  74+ 8F71              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................
  75+ 8F71              DoExplosionOrClear7:	                                                                                   ;;;;
  76+ 8F71              EE28:										; bit5 set do explosion, or bit7 clear, dont kill.             ;;;;   DoExplosion:If z ccordinate sign is +ve
  77+ 8F71              EE49:
  78+ 8F71              	JumpOnMemBitSet UBnKzsgn,7,TestToRemove ; if zSign is negative then its behind so see if we remove
  78+ 8F71 3A 13 C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnKzsgn)
  78+ 8F74 CB 7F       >                        bit 	7,a
  78+ 8F76 C2 E7 8F    >                        jp      nz,TestToRemove
  79+ 8F79              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................
  80+ 8F79              ObjectInFront:
  81+ 8F79              LL10:										; LL10	 object in front of you                                   ; if object z is > FarInFront
  82+ 8F79                  JumpIfMemGTENusng UBnKzhi,FarInFront,TestToRemove  ; LL14		\ test to remove object                               ;    else if abs(x) > z or abs(y) > z
  82+ 8F79 3A 12 C0    >                        ld     a,(UBnKzhi)
  82+ 8F7C FE C0       >                        cp     FarInFront
  82+ 8F7E D2 E7 8F    >                        jp	  nc,TestToRemove
  83+ 8F81              LL10CheckFov:
  84+ 8F81                  JumpIfObjectOutsideFov TestToRemove     ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  84+ 8F81             >LL10CheckXInFoV:
  84+ 8F81 2A 0B C0    >                        ld		hl, (INWKxlo)                   ; compare inkwk to to inwk z                                      ;    else
  84+ 8F84 ED 5B 11 C0 >                        ld		de, (INWKzlo)                   ; we can compare as ABS given + or - extreems will be out of view ;         .
  84+ 8F88 B7          >                        or		a							    ; clear carry flag for sbc                                        ;         .
  84+ 8F89 ED 52       >                        sbc		hl,de                           ; FOV is 90degrees                                                ;         .
  84+ 8F8B CB 7C       >                        bit     7,h
  84+ 8F8D CA E7 8F    >                        jp      z,TestToRemove                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  84+ 8F90             >LL10CheckYInFoV:
  84+ 8F90 2A 0E C0    >                        ld		hl, (INWKyLo)                                                                                     ;         .
  84+ 8F93 B7          >                        or		a							    ; clear carry flag                                                ;         .
  84+ 8F94 ED 52       >                        sbc		hl,de                           ; and test y axis, FOV is 90degrees                               ;         .
  84+ 8F96 CB 7C       >                        bit     7,h
  84+ 8F98 CA E7 8F    >                        jp      z,TestToRemove                        ; was the result -ve i.e. hl > de?  x > z so outside FoV                                                                          ;         .
  85+ 8F9B              LookAtGunNode:
  86+ 8F9B                  LL10AddGunNode                                                                                                ;         NodeHeap[GunVertex, GunVertex+1] = 255
  86+ 8F9B 3A 04 C3    >                        ld		a,(GunVertexAddr)	            ; Hull byte6, node gun*4 (Probably should be from bank            ;         hl = z / 8
  86+ 8F9E 4F          >                        ld		c,a                                                                                               ;         if zhi = 0
  86+ 8F9F 06 00       >                        ld      b,0                             ; bc now - GunNode                                                ;                                              ;             GOTO LL13
  86+ 8FA1 3E FF       >                        ld		a,$FF						    ; flag on node heap at gun                                        ;          else
  86+ 8FA3 21 BE C0    >                        ld      hl,UBnkNodeArray                ; flag node on node heap                                          ;
  86+ 8FA6 09          >                        add     hl,bc                           ; at position UBnkNodeArray[GunNode]
  86+ 8FA7             >MakeBothGunNodesVisible:
  86+ 8FA7 77          >                        ld      (hl),a                          ; made both gun line notes visible always
  86+ 8FA8 23          >                        inc     hl                              ;
  86+ 8FA9 77          >                        ld      (hl),a                          ;
  87+ 8FAA              LL10TestTooFarAway:                         ; if zhi / 8 > 0 then its too far
  88+ 8FAA                  JumpIfTooFarAway SkipToAsFar            ; LL13 - hop as far , i.e. zhi not 0 after divide by 8
  88+ 8FAA 2A 11 C0    >                        ld		hl,(UBnKzlo)                    ; hl = z position, by this point it must be positive
  88+ 8FAD             >                        ShiftHLDiv8                             ; z position / 8
  88+ 8FAD CB 3C       >			   srl h
  88+ 8FAF CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  88+ 8FB1 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  88+ 8FB3 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  88+ 8FB5 CB 3C       >			   srl h
  88+ 8FB7 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  88+ 8FB9 7C          >                        ld      a,h                             ;
  88+ 8FBA             >                        IfANotZeroGoto SkipToAsFar                       ; LL13 - hop as far , i.e. zhi not 0 after divide by 8
  88+ 8FBA FE 00       >				cp	0
  88+ 8FBC C2 D2 8F    >				jp	nz,SkipToAsFar
  89+ 8FBF              LL10CloseEnoughToDraw:
  90+ 8FBF              ; if zhi /16
  91+ 8FBF 7C               ld      a,h                             ; get zHi shifted again
  92+ 8FC0 CB 1F            rr      a                               ; bring in hi bit0 from last shiftHLRight1
  93+ 8FC2 CB 3F            srl     a                               ;
  94+ 8FC4 CB 3F            srl     a                               ;
  95+ 8FC6 CB 3F            srl     a                               ; zhi is now max 31
  96+ 8FC8 32 8C C0         ld      (UBnkVisibility),a              ; set XX4 to result, If this occurs then it’s a guaranteed call to LL17 to draw.
  97+ 8FCB              ;    Note the use of hop for jump/branch instrunction Rather than hop being calc logic
  98+ 8FCB              ;    The original did a bransh on positive but 3 shift right logicalks means bit 7 can never be set
  99+ 8FCB              ObjectDrawForwards:
 100+ 8FCB CD 7A 90         call    DrawForwards
 101+ 8FCE C9               ret
 102+ 8FCF C3 CB 8F         jp      ObjectDrawForwards              ; LL17 guaranteed hop to Draw wireframe
 103+ 8FD2              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................
 104+ 8FD2              SkipToAsFar:
 105+ 8FD2              ; IF we are here then the ship may just be a dot, if its exploding thought that overrides dot
 106+ 8FD2              LL13:                                       ; hopped to as far
 107+ 8FD2              LL13DrawIfNearerThanDotDist:
 108+ 8FD2              ; if dot_distance >= z_hi then we can still draw ship
 109+ 8FD2                  JumpIfMemGTEMemusng DotAddr,UBnKzhi,ObjectDrawForwards
 109+ 8FD2 3A 0B C3    >                        ld   a,(DotAddr)
 109+ 8FD5 21 12 C0    >                        ld   hl,UBnKzhi
 109+ 8FD8 BE          >                        cp   (hl)
 109+ 8FD9 D2 CB 8F    >                        jp	  nc,ObjectDrawForwards
 110+ 8FDC              LL13DrawIfExplodingTest:
 111+ 8FDC              ; if exploding then draw ship
 112+ 8FDC 3A 2A C0         ld      a,(UBnkexplDsp)                 ; INWK+31	\ exploding/display state|missiles
 113+ 8FDF E6 20            and     $20                             ; mask bit 5 exploding
 114+ 8FE1 C2 CB 8F         jp      nz,ObjectDrawForwards           ; LL17 hop over to Draw wireframe or exploding
 115+ 8FE4              LL13TooFarPlotPoint:
 116+ 8FE4 C3 F9 8F         jp      ShipPlotPoint                   ; SHPPT	\ else ship plot point, up.
 117+ 8FE7              ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
 118+ 8FE7              ;...............................................................................................................................................................................
 119+ 8FE7              ;;;LL14
 120+ 8FE7              ;;;   if bit5 of INWK31 is set								  ::LL14
 121+ 8FE7              ;;;      clear bit 3 of INWK31
 122+ 8FE7              ;;;      goto DO Explosion (DOEXP )
 123+ 8FE7              ;;;   end if
 124+ 8FE7              ;;;   if bit 3 of INKWK 31 is set                             ::EE51
 125+ 8FE7              ;;;      clear bt 3 of INK31
 126+ 8FE7              ;;;      goto Clear Lines from X19
 127+ 8FE7              ;;;   else
 128+ 8FE7              ;;;      return from subroutine
 129+ 8FE7              ;;;
 130+ 8FE7              TestToRemove:                                                                                             ;;;;
 131+ 8FE7              LL14:										; Test to remove object                                        ;;;;
 132+ 8FE7              	JumpOnMemBitSet UBnkexplDsp,5,EraseOldLines  ; bit5 currently exploding?                                      ;;;;
 132+ 8FE7 3A 2A C0    >                        ld      a,(UBnkexplDsp)
 132+ 8FEA CB 6F       >                        bit 	5,a
 132+ 8FEC C2 03 CD    >                        jp      nz,EraseOldLines
 133+ 8FEF              ; Ship is exploding
 134+ 8FEF              ; Not in documented code!!    JumpOnBitSet    a,7,EraseOldLines            ; bit7 ongoing explosion?                                      ;;;;
 135+ 8FEF E6 F7        	and		$F7								; clear bit3  - No longer being drawn
 136+ 8FF1 32 2A C0     	ld		(UBnkexplDsp),a					; INWK+31
 137+ 8FF4 C3 F7 8F     	jp		DOEXP							; DOEXP \ Explosion                                               ;
 138+ 8FF7              ;; EraseOldLines is in file EraseOldLines-EE51.asm
 139+ 8FF7
 140+ 8FF7              DOEXP: ; TODO
 141+ 8FF7 B7           	or a
 142+ 8FF8 C9           	ret
 143+ 8FF9
# file closed: ./ModelRender/draw_object.asm

   8+ 8FFF              SHPTOnScreenTest:

  10+ 9002 ED 5B 80 94  	ld		de,(varK4)

  12+ 9007 B2           	or		d								;
  13+ 9008 20 27        	jr		nz,SHPTFinishup					; quick test to see if K3 or K4 hi are populated , if they are its too big (or negative coord)
  14+ 900A 7B           	ld		a,e								; k4 or Y lo

  15+ 900B FE 80       >                        cp     ViewHeight
  15+ 900D D2 31 90    >                        jp		nc,SHPTFinishup
  16+ 9010              SHPTInjectFalseLine:						; it will always be 1 line only

  18+ 9012 32 F0 C2     	ld		(UbnkLineArrayLen),a
  19+ 9015 3E 04        	ld		a,4
  20+ 9017 32 F0 C2     	ld		(UbnkLineArrayLen),a

  31+ 9026              SHPTIsOnScreen:

  33+ 9027 4A           	ld		c,d								; bc = XY
  34+ 9028 3E FF        	ld		a,ShipColour
  35+ 902A              	MMUSelectLayer2
  35+ 902A ED 91 57 39 >					 nextreg L2memMMU,		    BankLAYER2
  36+ 902E CD FF E0         call    l2_plot_pixel
  37+ 9031              SHPTFinishup:

  39+ 9034 E6 F7            and     $F7                             ;  clear bit3
  40+ 9036 32 2A C0         ld      (UBnkexplDsp),a                 ; set bit3 (to erase later) and plot as Dot display|missiles explosion state
  41+ 9039 C9               ret                                     ; now it will return to the caller of

   1+ 9068              SetLastFaceVisible: MACRO
   2+ 9068 ~                                ld      a,$FF                       ; last normal is always visible                                                         ;;;

   4+ 9068                                  ENDM

   7+ 906A 32 AF C0                         ld      (UbnkFaceVisArray+15),a

   9+ 906E
  10+ 906E              CheckIfExplodingCall:
  11+ 906E              ; DEBUG TODO turn into MACRO later
  12+ 906E              ; Sets Z flag to true if only some faces are visible
  13+ 906E              ; Clears Z flag if exploding so all faces should be rendered
  14+ 906E 3A 2A C0             ld      a,(UBnkexplDsp)                 ; INWK+31                                                                               ;;; If bit 5 of exploding state is clear
  15+ 9071              ;;DEBUG
  16+ 9071 F6 FF                or      $FF ; force bit 5 set so exploding
  17+ 9073 32 2A C0             ld      (UBnkexplDsp),a
  18+ 9076              ;;DEBUG

  20+ 9077 E6 20                and     $20                         ; mask bit5 exploding                                                                   ;;;

   1+ 90A4
   2+ 90A4 00           memfillvalue		DB 0
   3+ 90A5 83 C3 C7 CB  memfill        		DB DMA_DISABLE,  DMA_RESET, DMA_RESET_PORT_A_TIMING, DMA_RESET_PORT_B_TIMING ,DMA_WRO_BLOCK_PORTA_A2B_XFR
   3+ 90A9 7D
   4+ 90AA A4 90        memfill_astrt  		DW memfillvalue
   5+ 90AC 00 40        memfill_length 		DB $00,$40
   6+ 90AE 24 10 AD     					DB DMA_WR1_P1FIXED_MEMORY ,DMA_WR2_P2INC_MEMORY ,DMA_WR4_CONT_MODE
   7+ 90B1 00 00        memfill_bstrt  		DB $00,$00
   8+ 90B3 82 CF B3 87  					DB DMA_STOP_AT_END, DMA_LOAD, DMA_FORCE_READY, DMA_ENABLE
   9+ 90B7              memfill_cmd_len	  	EQU $ - memfill
  10+ 90B7
  11+ 90B7              memfill_dma:
  12+ 90B7              ; "memfill_dma, hl = address to fill, a = value, de = length"
  13+ 90B7              .set_fill_value:
  14+ 90B7 32 A4 90     	ld 		(memfillvalue),a
  15+ 90BA              .set_target:
  16+ 90BA 22 B1 90     	ld		(memfill_bstrt),hl
  17+ 90BD              .set_length:
  18+ 90BD ED 53 AC 90  	ld		(memfill_length),de
  19+ 90C1              .write_dma:
  20+ 90C1 21 A5 90     	ld 		hl, memfill
  21+ 90C4 06 12        	ld 		b, memfill_cmd_len
  22+ 90C6 0E 6B        	ld		c,IO_DATAGEAR_DMA_PORT
  23+ 90C8 ED B3        	otir
  24+ 90CA C9           	ret
  25+ 90CB
# file closed: ./Hardware/memfill_dma.asm
