 843  A0BE              ; Include all maths libraries to test assembly
 844  A0BE                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhldesigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhldesigned.asm
   1+ A0BE              addhldesigned:
   2+ A0BE CB 7C                bit     7,h
   3+ A0C0 20 03                jr      nz,.noneghl
   4+ A0C2 CD 10 A5             call    negate16hl
   5+ A0C5              .noneghl:
   6+ A0C5 CB 7A                bit     7,d
   7+ A0C7 20 03                jr      nz,.nonegde
   8+ A0C9 CD 17 A5             call    negate16de
   9+ A0CC              .nonegde:
  10+ A0CC 19                   add     hl,de                       ; do 2'd c add
  11+ A0CD AF                   xor     a                           ; assume positive
  12+ A0CE CB 7C                bit     7,h
  13+ A0D0 C8                   ret     z                           ; if not set then can exit early
  14+ A0D1 CD 10 A5             call    negate16hl
  15+ A0D4 3E FF                ld      a,$FF
  16+ A0D6 C9                   ret
  17+ A0D7
# file closed: ./Maths/addhldesigned.asm
 845  A0D7                  INCLUDE "./Maths/addhlasigned.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
   1+ A0D7
   2+ A0D7              ; a = value to add
   3+ A0D7              ; b = offset (equivalent to regX)
   4+ A0D7              ; returns INWK [x] set to new value
   5+ A0D7              addINWKbasigned:
   6+ A0D7 21 0B C0     		ld 		hl,UBnKxlo                  ; hl = INWK 0
   7+ A0DA 4F           		ld      c,a                         ; preserve a
   8+ A0DB 78           		ld		a,b
   9+ A0DC ED 31        		add		hl,a                        ; hl = INWK[x]
  10+ A0DE 79                   ld      a,c                         ; get back a value
  11+ A0DF E6 80                and     $80                         ; get sign bit from a
  12+ A0E1 47                   ld      b,a                         ; now b = sign bit of a
  13+ A0E2 79                   ld      a,c                         ; a = original value
  14+ A0E3 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit                ; a = unsigned version of original value
  15+ A0E5              ; hl = unsigned version of INWK0[b]
  16+ A0E5              ; a = value to add, also in c which will optimise later code
  17+ A0E5              ; b = sign bit of a ( in old code was varT)
  18+ A0E5              addhlcsigned:
  19+ A0E5 5E                   ld      e,(hl)                      ; de = INKK value
  20+ A0E6 23                   inc     hl
  21+ A0E7 56                   ld      d,(hl)
  22+ A0E8 23                   inc     hl                          ; now pointing a sign
  23+ A0E9 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; a = sign bit
  24+ A0EA EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value now and de = pointer to sign
  25+ A0EB A8                   xor     b                           ; a = resultant sign
  26+ A0EC CB 7F                bit     7,a                         ; is it negative?
  27+ A0EE 28 28                jr      z,.postivecalc
  28+ A0F0              .negativecalc:
  29+ A0F0 7C                   ld      a,h
  30+ A0F1 E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ A0F3 67                   ld      h,a                         ; strip high bit
  32+ A0F4 DD 68                ld      ixl,b                       ; save sign bit from b into d
  33+ A0F6 06 00                ld      b,0                         ; c = value to subtract so now bc = value to subtract
  34+ A0F8 ED 42                sbc     hl,bc
  35+ A0FA DD 45                ld      b,ixl                       ; get sign back
  36+ A0FC EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to sign
  37+ A0FD 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;
  38+ A0FE E6 7F                and     SignMask8Bit
  39+ A100 DE 00                sbc     a,0                         ; subtract carry which could flip sign bit
  40+ A102 F6 80                or      $80                         ; set bit 0
  41+ A104 A8                   xor     b                           ; flip bit on sign (var T)
  42+ A105 77                   ld      (hl),a
  43+ A106 2B                   dec     hl
  44+ A107 72                   ld      (hl),d
  45+ A108 2B                   dec     hl
  46+ A109 73                   ld      (hl),e                      ; write out DE to INKW[x]0,1
  47+ A10A EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to start if INKW[x]
  48+ A10B D8                   ret     c                           ; if carry was set then we can exit now
  49+ A10C              .nocarry:
  50+ A10C CD 10 A5             call    negate16hl                  ; get hl back to positive, a is still inkw+2
  51+ A10F B0                   or      b                           ; b is still varT
  52+ A110 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = value hl = pointer to start if INKW[x]
  53+ A111 73                   ld      (hl),e
  54+ A112 23                   inc     hl
  55+ A113 72                   ld      (hl),d
  56+ A114 23                   inc     hl
  57+ A115 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; set sign bit in INKK[x]+2
  58+ A116 EB                   ex      de,hl                       ; hl = value de = pointer to sign
  59+ A117 C9                   ret
  60+ A118              .postivecalc:
  61+ A118 DD 68                ld      ixl,b
  62+ A11A 06 00                ld      b,0
  63+ A11C 19                   add     hl,de
  64+ A11D EB                   ex      de,hl
  65+ A11E DD B5                or      ixl                         ; we don;t need to recover b here
  66+ A120 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; push sign into INWK[x]
  67+ A121 2B                   dec     hl
  68+ A122 72                   ld      (hl),d
  69+ A123 2B                   dec     hl
  70+ A124 73                   ld      (hl),e
  71+ A125 C9                   ret
  72+ A126
  73+ A126              ;a = a AND 80 (i.e. bit 7) =>carry       so value is -
  74+ A126              ;MVT1
  75+ A126              ;    S = bits 6 to 0 of A
  76+ A126              ;    A = sign bit => T
  77+ A126              ;    xor sign bit with ink[x] Sign
  78+ A126              ;    if negative thn its not an add
  79+ A126              ;
  80+ A126              ;        and h, 7F
  81+ A126              ;        b = 0
  82+ A126              ;        c = varS
  83+ A126              ;        subtract INW[X]hilo, bc
  84+ A126              ;        retain carry
  85+ A126              ;        get INKW[x]Sign
  86+ A126              ;        and 7F
  87+ A126              ;        subtract carry (so will go negtive if negative)
  88+ A126              ;        xor bit 7 of h with T to flip bit
  89+ A126              ;        write to INKW[x]Sign
  90+ A126              ;
  91+ A126              ;    else
  92+ A126              ;MV10.
  93+ A126              ;        add INWK[x]hi,lo, varS
  94+ A126              ;        or      sign bit
  95+ A126
  96+ A126
# file closed: ./Maths/addhlasigned.asm
 846  A126                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AddDEtoCash.asm
   1+ A126              ; Note its big endian
   2+ A126 2A D8 97     addDEtoCash:            ld      hl,(Cash)
   3+ A129 19                                   add     hl,de
   4+ A12A 22 D8 97                             ld      (Cash),hl
   5+ A12D 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
   6+ A130 2A DA 97                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
   7+ A133 ED 5A                                adc     hl,de
   8+ A135 22 DA 97                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
   9+ A138 C9                                   ret
  10+ A139
  11+ A139 2A D8 97     subDEfromCash:          ld      hl,(Cash)
  12+ A13C 7C                                   ld      a,h
  13+ A13D B5                                   or      l
  14+ A13E 2A DA 97                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  15+ A141 B4                                   or      h
  16+ A142 B5                                   or      l
  17+ A143 C8                                   ret     z               ; No cash return
  18+ A144 B7                                   or      a
  19+ A145 2A D8 97                             ld      hl,(Cash)
  20+ A148 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  21+ A14A 22 D8 97                             ld      (Cash),hl
  22+ A14D 11 00 00                             ld      de,0
  23+ A150 2A DA 97                             ld      hl,(Cash+2)
  24+ A153 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  25+ A155 22 DA 97                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  26+ A158                                      JumpOnBitSet h,7,.ZeroCash
  26+ A158 CB 7C       >                        bit 	7,h
  26+ A15A C2 5E A1    >                        jp      nz,.ZeroCash
  27+ A15D C9                                   ret
  28+ A15E 21 00 00     .ZeroCash:              ld      hl,0
  29+ A161 22 D8 97                             ld      (Cash),hl
  30+ A164 22 DA 97                             ld      (Cash+2),hl
  31+ A167 C9                                   ret
  32+ A168

 847  A168                  INCLUDE "./Maths/multiply.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/multiply.asm
   1+ A168              HLequSRmulQdiv256:      ;X.Y=x1lo.S*M/256  	\ where M/256 is gradient
   2+ A168 2A 51 94                             ld  hl,(varRS)
   3+ A16B 3A 50 94                             ld  a,(varQ)
   4+ A16E C5 D5        HLeqyHLmulAdiv256:      push    bc,,de
   5+ A170 11 00 00                             ld  de,0        ; de = XY
   6+ A173 47                                   ld  b,a         ; b = Q
   7+ A174                                      ShiftHLRight1
   7+ A174 CB 3C       >			   srl h
   7+ A176 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
   8+ A178 CB 20                                sla b
   9+ A17A 30 03                                jr  nc,.LL126
  10+ A17C EB           .LL125:                 ex de,hl
  11+ A17D 19                                   add hl,de
  12+ A17E EB                                   ex  de,hl       ; de = de + rs
  13+ A17F              .LL126:                 ShiftHLRight1
  13+ A17F CB 3C       >			   srl h
  13+ A181 CB 1D       >			   rr  l
  14+ A183 CB 20                                sla b
  15+ A185 38 F5                                jr      c,.LL125
  16+ A187 20 F6                                jr      nz,.LL126
  17+ A189 EB                                   ex      de,hl   ; hl = result
  18+ A18A D1 C1                                pop     bc,,de
  19+ A18C C9                                   ret
  20+ A18D
  21+ A18D
  22+ A18D              MacroDEEquQmulASigned:  MACRO
  23+ A18D ~                                    ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  24+ A18D ~                                    ld      a,(varQ)
  25+ A18D ~                                    ld      e,a
  26+ A18D ~                                    xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  27+ A18D ~                                    and     SignOnly8Bit
  28+ A18D ~                                    ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  29+ A18D ~                                    ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  30+ A18D ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  31+ A18D ~                                    ld      d,a
  32+ A18D ~                                    ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  33+ A18D ~                                    and     SignMask8Bit
  34+ A18D ~                                    ld      e,a
  35+ A18D ~                                    mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  36+ A18D ~                                    ld      a,d
  37+ A18D ~                                    or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  38+ A18D ~                                    ld      d,a
  39+ A18D                                      ENDM
  40+ A18D
  41+ A18D
  42+ A18D
  43+ A18D                                 ; .MAD	\ -> &22AD  \ Multiply and Add  (DE also) X.A(Lo.Hi) = Q*A + R.S (Lo.Hi)
  44+ A18D              madXAequQmulAaddRS:     MacroDEEquQmulASigned
  44+ A18D 57          >                        ld      d,a                         ; save a into d
  44+ A18E 3A 50 94    >                        ld      a,(varQ)
  44+ A191 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ A192 AA          >                        xor     d                           ; a = a xor var Q
  44+ A193 E6 80       >                        and     SignOnly8Bit
  44+ A195 47          >                        ld      b,a                         ; b = sign of a xor q
  44+ A196 7A          >                        ld      a,d                         ; d = abs d (or a reg)
  44+ A197 E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ A199 57          >                        ld      d,a
  44+ A19A 7B          >                        ld      a,e                         ; e = abs e (or varQ)
  44+ A19B E6 7F       >                        and     SignMask8Bit
  44+ A19D 5F          >                        ld      e,a
  44+ A19E ED 30       >                        mul                                 ; de = a * Q
  44+ A1A0 7A          >                        ld      a,d
  44+ A1A1 B0          >                        or      b                           ; de = a * Q leading sign bit
  44+ A1A2 57          >                        ld      d,a
  45+ A1A3 2A 51 94     madDEaddRS:             ld		hl,(varR)
  46+ A1A6 CD AF A1                             call	madXAAddHLDESigned
  47+ A1A9 EB                                   ex      de,hl                       ; de = R.S + DE
  48+ A1AA                                      ClearCarryFlag
  48+ A1AA B7          >                        or a
  49+ A1AB DD 6B                                ld      ixl,e
  50+ A1AD 7A                                   ld      a,d
  51+ A1AE C9                                   ret
  52+ A1AF
  53+ A1AF
  54+ A1AF 7C           madXAAddHLDESigned:     ld      a,h
  55+ A1B0 E6 80                                and     SignOnly8Bit
  56+ A1B2 47                                   ld      b,a                         ;save sign bit in b
  57+ A1B3 AA                                   xor     d                           ;if h sign and d sign were different then bit 7 of a will be 1 which means
  58+ A1B4                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDEOppSGN        ;Signs are opposite there fore we can subtract to get difference
  58+ A1B4 FA CC A1    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDEOppSGN
  59+ A1B7 78           .ADDHLDESameSigns:       ld      a,b
  60+ A1B8 B2                                   or      d
  61+ A1B9                                      JumpIfNegative .ADDHLDESameNeg       ; optimisation so we can just do simple add if both positive
  61+ A1B9 FA BE A1    >                        jp		m, .ADDHLDESameNeg
  62+ A1BC 19                                   add     hl,de
  63+ A1BD C9                                   ret
  64+ A1BE 7C           .ADDHLDESameNeg:         ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit
  65+ A1BF E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  66+ A1C1 67                                   ld      h,a
  67+ A1C2 7A                                   ld      a,d
  68+ A1C3 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  69+ A1C5 57                                   ld      d,a
  70+ A1C6 19                                   add     hl,de
  71+ A1C7 3E 80                                ld      a,SignOnly8Bit
  72+ A1C9 B4                                   or      h                           ; now set bit for negative value, we won't bother with overflow for now TODO
  73+ A1CA 67                                   ld      h,a
  74+ A1CB C9                                   ret
  75+ A1CC 7C           .ADDHLDEOppSGN:          ld      a,h                         ; so if we enter here then signs are the same so we clear the 16th bit                     ; here HL and DE are opposite
  76+ A1CD E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit                ; we could check the value of b for optimisation
  77+ A1CF 67                                   ld      h,a
  78+ A1D0 7A                                   ld      a,d
  79+ A1D1 E6 7F                                and     SignMask8Bit
  80+ A1D3 57                                   ld      d,a
  81+ A1D4 B7                                   or      a
  82+ A1D5 ED 52                                sbc     hl,de
  83+ A1D7 38 04                                jr      c,.ADDHLDEOppInvert
  84+ A1D9 78           .ADDHLDEOppSGNNoCarry:   ld      a,b                         ; we got here so hl > de therefore we can just take hl's previous sign bit
  85+ A1DA B4                                   or      h
  86+ A1DB 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; set the previou sign value
  87+ A1DC C9                                   ret
  88+ A1DD              .ADDHLDEOppInvert:       NegHL                                                   ; we need to flip the sign and 2'c the Hl result
  88+ A1DD AF          >                xor a
  88+ A1DE 95          >                sub l
  88+ A1DF 6F          >                ld l,a
  88+ A1E0 9F          >                sbc a,a
  88+ A1E1 94          >                sub h
  88+ A1E2 67          >                ld h,a
  89+ A1E3 78                                   ld      a,b
  90+ A1E4 EE 80                                xor     SignOnly8Bit                ; flip sign bit
  91+ A1E6 B4                                   or      h
  92+ A1E7 67                                   ld      h,a                         ; recover sign
  93+ A1E8 C9                                   ret
  94+ A1E9
  95+ A1E9
  96+ A1E9                  ; multiplication of 16-bit number and 8-bit number into a 24-bit product
  97+ A1E9                  ;
  98+ A1E9                  ; enter : hl = 16-bit multiplier   = x
  99+ A1E9                  ;          e =  8-bit multiplicand = y
 100+ A1E9                  ;
 101+ A1E9                  ; exit  : ahl = 24-bit product
 102+ A1E9                  ;         carry reset
 103+ A1E9                  ;
 104+ A1E9                  ; uses  : af, de, hl
 105+ A1E9 54           AHLequHLmulE:           ld d,h                      ; xh
 106+ A1EA 63                                   ld h,e                      ; yl
 107+ A1EB ED 30                                mul de                      ; xh*yl
 108+ A1ED EB                                   ex de,hl
 109+ A1EE ED 30                                mul de                      ; yl*xl, hl = xh*yl
 110+ A1F0
 111+ A1F0 7A                                   ld  a,d                     ; sum products
 112+ A1F1 85                                   add a,l
 113+ A1F2 57                                   ld  d,a
 114+ A1F3 EB                                   ex de,hl
 115+ A1F4
 116+ A1F4 7A                                   ld  a,d
 117+ A1F5 CE 00                                adc a,0
 118+ A1F7 C9                                   ret
 119+ A1F8
 120+ A1F8
 121+ A1F8
 122+ A1F8                 ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 32-bit product
 123+ A1F8                 ;
 124+ A1F8                 ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand = y
 125+ A1F8                 ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand = x
 126+ A1F8                 ;
 127+ A1F8                 ; exit  : dehl = 32-bit product
 128+ A1F8                 ;         carry reset
 129+ A1F8                 ;
 130+ A1F8                 ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 131+ A1F8
 132+ A1F8
 133+ A1F8
 134+ A1F8 45           DEHLequDEmulHL:         ld b,l                      ; x0
 135+ A1F9 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; y0
 136+ A1FA 5D                                   ld e,l                      ; x0
 137+ A1FB 6A                                   ld l,d
 138+ A1FC E5                                   push hl                     ; x1 y1
 139+ A1FD 69                                   ld l,c                      ; y0
 140+ A1FE              ; bc = x0 y0, de = y1 x0,  hl = x1 y0,  stack = x1 y1
 141+ A1FE ED 30                                mul de                      ; y1*x0
 142+ A200 EB                                   ex de,hl
 143+ A201 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y0
 144+ A203
 145+ A203 AF                                   xor a                       ; zero A
 146+ A204 19                                   add hl,de                   ; sum cross products p2 p1
 147+ A205 8F                                   adc a,a                     ; capture carry p3
 148+ A206
 149+ A206 59                                   ld e,c                      ; x0
 150+ A207 50                                   ld d,b                      ; y0
 151+ A208 ED 30                                mul de                      ; y0*x0
 152+ A20A
 153+ A20A 47                                   ld b,a                      ; carry from cross products
 154+ A20B 4C                                   ld c,h                      ; LSB of MSW from cross products
 155+ A20C
 156+ A20C 7A                                   ld a,d
 157+ A20D 85                                   add a,l
 158+ A20E 67                                   ld h,a
 159+ A20F 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; LSW in HL p1 p0
 160+ A210
 161+ A210 D1                                   pop de
 162+ A211 ED 30                                mul de                      ; x1*y1
 163+ A213
 164+ A213 EB                                   ex de,hl
 165+ A214 ED 4A                                adc hl,bc
 166+ A216 EB                                   ex de,hl                    ; de = final MSW
 167+ A217
 168+ A217 C9                                   ret
 169+ A218
 170+ A218              ; multiplication of two 16-bit numbers into a 16-bit product
 171+ A218              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 172+ A218              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 173+ A218              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 174+ A218              ;         carry reset
 175+ A218              ; maths is
 176+ A218              ;        hl = y , de= x
 177+ A218              ;        hl = xhi,ylo + (yhigh * xlow)
 178+ A218              ;        hl = yhih & xlo + x
 179+ A218              ;
 180+ A218              ;
 181+ A218              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 182+ A218 C5           mulDEbyHL:              push    bc
 183+ A219 7A                                   ld a,d                      ; a = xh
 184+ A21A 54                                   ld d,h                      ; d = yh
 185+ A21B 67                                   ld h,a                      ; h = xh
 186+ A21C 4B                                   ld c,e                      ; c = xl
 187+ A21D 45                                   ld b,l                      ; b = yl
 188+ A21E ED 30                                mul                         ; yh * yl
 189+ A220 EB                                   ex de,hl
 190+ A221 ED 30                                mul                         ; xh * yl
 191+ A223 19                                   add hl,de                   ; add cross products
 192+ A224 59                                   ld e,c
 193+ A225 50                                   ld d,b
 194+ A226 ED 30                                mul                         ; yl * xl
 195+ A228 7D                                   ld a,l                      ; cross products lsb
 196+ A229 82                                   add a,d                     ; add to msb final
 197+ A22A 67                                   ld h,a
 198+ A22B 6B                                   ld l,e                      ; hl = final
 199+ A22C                                      ; 83 cycles, 19 bytes
 200+ A22C AF                                   xor a                       ; reset carry
 201+ A22D C1                                   pop     bc
 202+ A22E C9                                   ret
 203+ A22F
 204+ A22F              ; multiplication of two S156-bit numbers into a 16-bit 2'd compliment product
 205+ A22F              ; enter : de = 16-bit multiplicand
 206+ A22F              ;         hl = 16-bit multiplicand
 207+ A22F              ; exit  : hl = 16-bit product
 208+ A22F              ;         carry reset
 209+ A22F              ;
 210+ A22F              ; uses  : af, bc, de, hl
 211+ A22F 00           mulDEbyHLSignByte       DB      0
 212+ A230 AF           mulDEbyHLSgnTo2c:       xor     a
 213+ A231 32 2F A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 214+ A234 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 215+ A235 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 216+ A238 28 08                                jr      z,.SignHL
 217+ A23A E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 218+ A23C 57                                   ld      d,a
 219+ A23D 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 220+ A23F 32 2F A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 221+ A242 7C           .SignHL:                ld      a,h
 222+ A243 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 223+ A246 28 0B                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 224+ A248 E6 7F        .NegativeHL:            and     $7F
 225+ A24A 67                                   ld      h,a
 226+ A24B 3A 2F A2                             ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 227+ A24E EE 80                                xor     $80
 228+ A250 32 2F A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 229+ A253 CD 18 A2     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 230+ A256 3A 2F A2     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 231+ A259 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 232+ A25C C8                                   ret     z
 233+ A25D AF           .Negateghl: 				xor 	a
 234+ A25E 95                                   sub 	l
 235+ A25F 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 236+ A260 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 237+ A261 94                                   sub 	h
 238+ A262 67                                   ld 		h,a
 239+ A263 C9                                   ret
 240+ A264
 241+ A264 AF           mulDESgnbyHLUnsgnTo2c:  xor     a
 242+ A265 32 2F A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 243+ A268 7A           .SignDE:                ld      a,d
 244+ A269 ED 27 80                             test    $80
 245+ A26C 28 08                                jr      z,.AbsoluteMultiply
 246+ A26E E6 7F        .NegativeDE:            and     $7F
 247+ A270 57                                   ld      d,a
 248+ A271 3E 80                                ld      a,$80
 249+ A273 32 2F A2                             ld      (mulDEbyHLSignByte),a
 250+ A276 CD 18 A2     .AbsoluteMultiply:      call    mulDEbyHL
 251+ A279 3A 2F A2     .RecoverSign:           ld      a,(mulDEbyHLSignByte)
 252+ A27C ED 27 80                             test    $80
 253+ A27F C8                                   ret     z
 254+ A280 AF           .Negateghl:             xor 	a
 255+ A281 95                                   sub 	l
 256+ A282 6F                                   ld 		l,a
 257+ A283 9F                                   sbc 	a,a
 258+ A284 94                                   sub 	h
 259+ A285 67                                   ld 		h,a
 260+ A286 C9                                   ret

# file closed: ./Maths/multiply.asm
 848  A287                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_square.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
   1+ A287              ; "ASM_SQUA : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A287              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi"
   3+ A287
   4+ A287              inline_squde: MACRO
   5+ A287 ~            			ld	e,a
   6+ A287 ~            			ld  d,a
   7+ A287 ~            			mul
   8+ A287              			ENDM
   9+ A287
  10+ A287              inline_squa: MACRO
  11+ A287 ~            			ld	e,a
  12+ A287 ~            			ld  d,a
  13+ A287 ~            			mul
  14+ A287 ~            			ld	a,e
  15+ A287              			ENDM
  16+ A287
  17+ A287
  18+ A287              asm_squa:
  19+ A287 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  20+ A289              ; "ASM SQUA2 : TESTGOOD"
  21+ A289              ; "AP = A^2 A = low,P = hi singed"
  22+ A289              asm_squa2:
  23+ A289 5F           	ld e, a
  24+ A28A 57           	ld d,a
  25+ A28B ED 30        	mul
  26+ A28D ED 53 F5 93  	ld (varP),de
  27+ A291 7B           	ld a,e
  28+ A292 C9           	ret
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_square.asm
 849  A293                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
   1+ A293              ; "ASM SQRT : TESTGOOD"
   2+ A293              ; "16-bit integer square root"
   3+ A293              ; "call with de = number to square root"
   4+ A293              ; "returns   hl = square root"
   5+ A293              ; "corrupts  bc, de"
   6+ A293              asm_sqrt:
   7+ A293 01 00 80     	ld bc,$8000
   8+ A296 61           	ld h,c
   9+ A297 69           	ld l,c
  10+ A298              .sqrloop:
  11+ A298 CB 38        	srl b
  12+ A29A CB 19        	rr c
  13+ A29C 09           	add hl,bc
  14+ A29D EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A29E ED 52        	sbc hl,de
  16+ A2A0 38 04        	jr c,.sqrbit
  17+ A2A2 EB           	ex de,hl
  18+ A2A3 09           	add hl,bc
  19+ A2A4 18 05        	jr .sqrfi
  20+ A2A6              .sqrbit:
  21+ A2A6 19           	add hl,de
  22+ A2A7 EB           	ex de,hl
  23+ A2A8 B7           	or a
  24+ A2A9 ED 42        	sbc hl,bc
  25+ A2AB              .sqrfi:
  26+ A2AB CB 3C        	srl h
  27+ A2AD CB 1D        	rr l
  28+ A2AF CB 38        	srl b
  29+ A2B1 CB 19        	rr c
  30+ A2B3 30 E3        	jr nc,.sqrloop
  31+ A2B5 C9           	ret
  32+ A2B6
  33+ A2B6
  34+ A2B6              sqrtQR:					; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
  35+ A2B6 3A 50 94     	ld		a,(varQ)
  36+ A2B9 5F           	ld		e,a
  37+ A2BA 3A 51 94     	ld		a,(varR)
  38+ A2BD 57           	ld		d,a
  39+ A2BE CD 93 A2     	call	asm_sqrt
  40+ A2C1 7D               ld      a,l
  41+ A2C2 32 50 94     	ld		(varQ),a
  42+ A2C5 C9           	ret
  43+ A2C6
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_sqrt.asm
 850  A2C6                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_divide.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
   1+ A2C6              ; Divide 8-bit values
   2+ A2C6              ; In: Divide E by divider C
   3+ A2C6              ; Out: A = result, B = rest
   4+ A2C6              ;
   5+ A2C6              ;;;Div8:
   6+ A2C6              ;;;    xor a
   7+ A2C6              ;;;    ld b,8
   8+ A2C6              ;;;Div8_Loop:
   9+ A2C6              ;;;    rl e
  10+ A2C6              ;;;    rla
  11+ A2C6              ;;;    sub c
  12+ A2C6              ;;;    jr nc,Div8_NoAdd
  13+ A2C6              ;;;    add a,c
  14+ A2C6              ;;;Div8_NoAdd:
  15+ A2C6              ;;;    djnz Div8_Loop
  16+ A2C6              ;;;    ld b,a
  17+ A2C6              ;;;    ld a,e
  18+ A2C6              ;;;    rla
  19+ A2C6              ;;;    cpl
  20+ A2C6              ;;;    ret
  21+ A2C6
  22+ A2C6              ;;Inputs: DE is the numerator, BC is the divisor
  23+ A2C6              ;;Outputs: DE is the result
  24+ A2C6              ;;         A is a copy of E
  25+ A2C6              ;;         HL is the remainder
  26+ A2C6              ;;         BC is not changed
  27+ A2C6              ;; so DE = DE /BC
  28+ A2C6              ;140 bytes
  29+ A2C6              ;145cc
  30+ A2C6
  31+ A2C6              MacroDEDivBC:       MACRO
  32+ A2C6 ~                                rla
  33+ A2C6 ~                                adc     hl,hl
  34+ A2C6 ~                                sbc     hl,bc
  35+ A2C6 ~                                jr      nc,$+3
  36+ A2C6 ~                                add     hl,bc
  37+ A2C6                                  ENDM
  38+ A2C6
  39+ A2C6              DEequDEDivBC:
  40+ A2C6 AF               xor a
  41+ A2C7 ED 62            sbc hl,hl
  42+ A2C9 7A               ld a,d
  43+ A2CA                  MacroDEDivBC
  43+ A2CA 17          >                    rla
  43+ A2CB ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  43+ A2CD ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  43+ A2CF 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  43+ A2D1 09          >                    add     hl,bc
  44+ A2D2                  MacroDEDivBC

  44+ A2D3 ED 6A       >                    adc     hl,hl
  44+ A2D5 ED 42       >                    sbc     hl,bc
  44+ A2D7 30 01       >                    jr      nc,$+3
  44+ A2D9 09          >                    add     hl,bc

  68+ A352
  69+ A352
  70+ A352
  71+ A352              ;divdide by 16 using undocumented instrunctions
  72+ A352              ;Input: BC = Dividend, DE = Divisor, HL = 0
  73+ A352              ;Output: BC = Quotient, HL = Remainder
  74+ A352              ; Our use
  75+ A352              ; BC = A0
  76+ A352              ; DE = 0C
  77+ A352              ; so BC = a * 256 / C
  78+ A352              DIV16Amul256dCUNDOC:    JumpIfAGTENusng	  c,DEV16ATooLarge                                          ; first off if a > c ten return 255
  78+ A352 B9          >                        cp     c
  78+ A353 D2 7E A3    >                        jp		nc,DEV16ATooLarge
  79+ A356 47                                   ld      b,a
  80+ A357 59                                   ld      e,c
  81+ A358 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  82+ A35A 16 00                                ld      d,0
  83+ A35C C3 69 A3                             jp      DIV16UNDOC
  84+ A35F 47           DIV16Amul256dQUNDOC:    ld      b,a
  85+ A360 0E 00                                ld      c,0
  86+ A362 21 50 94                             ld      hl,varQ
  87+ A365 7E                                   ld      a,(hl)
  88+ A366 16 00                                ld      d,0
  89+ A368 5F                                   ld      e,a
  90+ A369              DIV16BCDivDEUNDOC:
  91+ A369 21 00 00     DIV16UNDOC:             ld      hl,0
  92+ A36C 78                                   ld      a,b
  93+ A36D 06 10                                ld      b,16
  94+ A36F CB 31        DIV16UNDOCLOOP:         sll	c		; unroll 16 times
  95+ A371 17                                   rla			; ...
  96+ A372 ED 6A                                adc	hl,hl		; ...
  97+ A374 ED 52                                sbc	hl,de		; ...
  98+ A376 30 02                                jr	nc,DIV16UNDOCSKIP		; ...
  99+ A378 19                                   add	hl,de		; ...
 100+ A379 0D                                   dec	c		; ...
 101+ A37A 10 F3        DIV16UNDOCSKIP:         djnz DIV16UNDOCLOOP
 102+ A37C 47                                   ld   b,a
 103+ A37D C9                                   ret
 104+ A37E 01 FF 00     DEV16ATooLarge:         ld     bc,$00FF
 105+ A381 C9                                   ret
 106+ A382
 107+ A382              ; "> asm_div8 C_Div_D - C is the numerator, D is the denominator, A is the remainder, B is 0, C is the result of C/D,D,E,H,L are not changed"
 108+ A382 06 08        asm_div8:               ld b,8
 109+ A384 AF                                   xor a
 110+ A385 CB 21        div8_loop:	            sla c
 111+ A387 17                                   rla
 112+ A388 BA                                   cp d
 113+ A389 38 02                                jr c,div8_skip
 113+ A38B
 114+ A38B 0C                                   inc c
 115+ A38C 92                                   sub d
 116+ A38D 10 F6        div8_skip:	            djnz div8_loop
 117+ A38F C9                                   ret
 118+ A390              ; ">asm_div16: HL_Div_C: HL is the numerator,  C is the denominator, output A is the remainder, B is 0, C,DE is not changedHL is the quotient"
 119+ A390 06 10        asm_div16:              ld b,16
 120+ A392 AF                                   xor a
 121+ A393 CB 25        div16_loop:	            sla l
 122+ A395 CB 14                                rl	h
 123+ A397              ;    add hl,hl
 124+ A397 17                                   rla
 125+ A398 B9                                   cp c
 126+ A399 38 02                                jr c,div16_skip
 127+ A39B 2C                                   inc l
 128+ A39C 91                                   sub c
 129+ A39D 10 F4        div16_skip:		        djnz div16_loop
 130+ A39F C9                                   ret
 131+ A3A0              ;
 132+ A3A0              ; Divide 16-bit values (with 16-bit result)
 133+ A3A0              ; In: Divide BC by divider DE
 134+ A3A0              ; Out: BC = result, HL = rest
 135+ A3A0              ;
 136+ A3A0              HLDivC_Iteration: 	MACRO
 137+ A3A0 ~            					add	hl,hl		; unroll 16 times
 138+ A3A0 ~            					rla				; ...
 139+ A3A0 ~            					cp	c			; ...
 140+ A3A0 ~            					jr	1F
 141+ A3A0 ~            					sub	c			; ...
 142+ A3A0 ~            1:
 143+ A3A0 ~            					inc	l			; ...
 144+ A3A0              					ENDM
 145+ A3A0
 146+ A3A0
 147+ A3A0
 148+ A3A0              ; ">div1616: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder"
 149+ A3A0 21 00 00     Div1616:            ld hl,0
 150+ A3A3 78                               ld a,b
 151+ A3A4 06 08                            ld b,8
 152+ A3A6 17           .Div16_Loop1:       rla
 153+ A3A7 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 154+ A3A9 ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 155+ A3AB 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd1
 156+ A3AD 19                               add hl,de
 157+ A3AE 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd1:      djnz .Div16_Loop1
 158+ A3B0 17                               rla
 159+ A3B1 2F                               cpl
 160+ A3B2 47                               ld b,a
 161+ A3B3 79                               ld a,c
 162+ A3B4 48                               ld c,b
 163+ A3B5 06 08                            ld b,8
 164+ A3B7 17           .Div16_Loop2:       rla
 165+ A3B8 ED 6A                            adc hl,hl
 166+ A3BA ED 52                            sbc hl,de
 167+ A3BC 30 01                            jr nc,.Div16_NoAdd2
 168+ A3BE 19                               add hl,de
 169+ A3BF 10 F6        .Div16_NoAdd2:      djnz .Div16_Loop2
 170+ A3C1 17                               rla
 171+ A3C2 2F                               cpl
 172+ A3C3 41                               ld b,c
 173+ A3C4 4F                               ld c,a
 174+ A3C5 C9                               ret
 175+ A3C6
 176+ A3C6
 177+ A3C6
 178+ A3C6              BCDIVDE_Iteration: MACRO
 179+ A3C6 ~            				   rla
 180+ A3C6 ~            				   adc	hl,hl
 181+ A3C6 ~            				   add	hl,de
 182+ A3C6 ~            				   jr	c,1F
 183+ A3C6 ~            				   sbc	hl,de
 184+ A3C6 ~            1:
 185+ A3C6              				   ENDM
 186+ A3C6
 187+ A3C6
 188+ A3C6              ; ">BC_Div_DE: BC = BC / DE. HL = remainder fast divide with unrolled loop"
 189+ A3C6              ;BC/DE ==> BC, remainder in HL
 190+ A3C6              ;NOTE: BC/0 returns 0 as the quotient.
 191+ A3C6              ;min: 738cc
 192+ A3C6              ;max: 898cc
 193+ A3C6              ;avg: 818cc
 194+ A3C6              ;144 bytes
 195+ A3C6 AF           BC_Div_DE:              xor a
 196+ A3C7 67                                   ld h,a
 197+ A3C8 6F                                   ld l,a
 198+ A3C9 93                                   sub e
 199+ A3CA 5F                                   ld e,a
 200+ A3CB 9F                                   sbc a,a
 201+ A3CC 92                                   sub d
 202+ A3CD 57                                   ld d,a
 203+ A3CE 78                                   ld a,b
 204+ A3CF                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 204+ A3CF 17          >				   rla
 204+ A3D0 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 204+ A3D2 19          >				   add	hl,de
 204+ A3D3 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 204+ A3D5 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 204+ A3D7             >1:
 205+ A3D7                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 205+ A3D7 17          >				   rla
 205+ A3D8 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 205+ A3DA 19          >				   add	hl,de
 205+ A3DB 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 205+ A3DD ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 205+ A3DF             >1:
 206+ A3DF                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 206+ A3DF 17          >				   rla
 206+ A3E0 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 206+ A3E2 19          >				   add	hl,de
 206+ A3E3 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 206+ A3E5 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 206+ A3E7             >1:
 207+ A3E7                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 207+ A3E7 17          >				   rla
 207+ A3E8 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 207+ A3EA 19          >				   add	hl,de
 207+ A3EB 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 207+ A3ED ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 207+ A3EF             >1:
 208+ A3EF                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 208+ A3EF 17          >				   rla
 208+ A3F0 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 208+ A3F2 19          >				   add	hl,de
 208+ A3F3 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 208+ A3F5 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 208+ A3F7             >1:
 209+ A3F7                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 209+ A3F7 17          >				   rla
 209+ A3F8 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 209+ A3FA 19          >				   add	hl,de
 209+ A3FB 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 209+ A3FD ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 209+ A3FF             >1:
 210+ A3FF                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 210+ A3FF 17          >				   rla
 210+ A400 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 210+ A402 19          >				   add	hl,de
 210+ A403 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 210+ A405 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 210+ A407             >1:
 211+ A407                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 211+ A407 17          >				   rla
 211+ A408 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 211+ A40A 19          >				   add	hl,de
 211+ A40B 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 211+ A40D ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 211+ A40F             >1:
 212+ A40F 17                                   rla
 213+ A410 47                                   ld b,a
 214+ A411
 215+ A411 79                                   ld a,c
 216+ A412                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 216+ A412 17          >				   rla
 216+ A413 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 216+ A415 19          >				   add	hl,de
 216+ A416 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 216+ A418 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 216+ A41A             >1:
 217+ A41A                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 217+ A41A 17          >				   rla
 217+ A41B ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 217+ A41D 19          >				   add	hl,de
 217+ A41E 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 217+ A420 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 217+ A422             >1:
 218+ A422                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 218+ A422 17          >				   rla
 218+ A423 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 218+ A425 19          >				   add	hl,de
 218+ A426 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 218+ A428 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 218+ A42A             >1:
 219+ A42A                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 219+ A42A 17          >				   rla
 219+ A42B ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 219+ A42D 19          >				   add	hl,de
 219+ A42E 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 219+ A430 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 219+ A432             >1:
 220+ A432                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 220+ A432 17          >				   rla
 220+ A433 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 220+ A435 19          >				   add	hl,de
 220+ A436 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 220+ A438 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 220+ A43A             >1:
 221+ A43A                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 221+ A43A 17          >				   rla
 221+ A43B ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 221+ A43D 19          >				   add	hl,de
 221+ A43E 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 221+ A440 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 221+ A442             >1:
 222+ A442                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 222+ A442 17          >				   rla
 222+ A443 ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 222+ A445 19          >				   add	hl,de
 222+ A446 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 222+ A448 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 222+ A44A             >1:
 223+ A44A                                      BCDIVDE_Iteration
 223+ A44A 17          >				   rla
 223+ A44B ED 6A       >				   adc	hl,hl
 223+ A44D 19          >				   add	hl,de
 223+ A44E 38 02       >				   jr	c,1F
 223+ A450 ED 52       >				   sbc	hl,de
 223+ A452             >1:
 224+ A452 17                                   rla
 225+ A453 4F                                   ld c,a
 226+ A454 C9                                   ret
 227+ A455
 228+ A455              ;Inputs:
 229+ A455              ;     DE,BC are 8.8 Fixed Point numbers
 230+ A455              ;Outputs:
 231+ A455              ;     DE is the 8.8 Fixed Point result (rounded to the least significant bit)
 232+ A455              ;if DE is 0 : 122cc or 136cc if BC is negative
 233+ A455              ;if |BC|>=128*|DE| : 152cc or 166cc if BC is negative
 234+ A455              ;Otherwise:
 235+ A455              ;min: 1107cc
 236+ A455              ;max: 1319cc
 237+ A455              ;avg: 1201cc
 238+ A455 78           BC_Div_DE_88:           ld a,b  ; First, find out if the output is positive or negative
 239+ A456 AA                                   xor d
 240+ A457 F5                                   push af   ;sign bit is the result sign bit
 241+ A458              ; Now make sure the inputs are positive
 242+ A458 A8                                   xor b     ;A now has the value of B, since I XORed it with D twice (cancelling)
 243+ A459 F2 62 A4                             jp p,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1   ;if Positive, don't negate
 244+ A45C AF                                   xor a
 245+ A45D 91                                   sub c
 246+ A45E 4F                                   ld c,a
 247+ A45F 9F                                   sbc a,a
 248+ A460 90                                   sub b
 249+ A461 47                                   ld b,a
 250+ A462 7A           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl1:      ld a,d  ;now make DE negative to optimize the remainder comparison
 251+ A463 B2                                   or d
 252+ A464 FA 6D A4                             jp m,BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2
 253+ A467 AF                                   xor a
 254+ A468 93                                   sub e
 255+ A469 5F                                   ld e,a
 256+ A46A 9F                                   sbc a,a
 257+ A46B 92                                   sub d
 258+ A46C 57                                   ld d,a
 259+ A46D B3           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl2:      or e      ;if DE is 0, we can call it an overflow ;A is the current value of D
 260+ A46E 28 1D                                jr z,div_fixed88_overflow
 261+ A470 26 00                                ld h,0          ;The accumulator gets set to B if no overflow.;We can use H=0 to save a few cc in the meantime
 262+ A472 78                                   ld a,b;if B+DE>=0, then we'll have overflow
 263+ A473 83                                   add a,e
 264+ A474 7A                                   ld a,d
 265+ A475 8C                                   adc a,h
 266+ A476 38 15                                jr c,div_fixed88_overflow
 267+ A478 68                                   ld l,b  ;Now we can load the accumulator/remainder with B;H is already 0
 268+ A479 79                                   ld a,c
 269+ A47A CD 95 A4                             call div_fixed88_sub
 270+ A47D 4F                                   ld c,a
 271+ A47E 78                                   ld a,b      ;A is now 0
 272+ A47F CD 95 A4                             call div_fixed88_sub
 273+ A482 51                                   ld d,c
 274+ A483 5F                                   ld e,a
 275+ A484 F1                                   pop af
 276+ A485 F0                                   ret p
 277+ A486 AF                                   xor a
 278+ A487 93                                   sub e
 279+ A488 5F                                   ld e,a
 280+ A489 9F                                   sbc a,a
 281+ A48A 92                                   sub d
 282+ A48B 57                                   ld d,a
 283+ A48C C9                                   ret
 284+ A48D
 285+ A48D 11 FF 7F     div_fixed88_overflow:   ld de,$7FFF
 286+ A490 F1                                   pop af
 287+ A491 F0                                   ret p
 288+ A492 13                                   inc de
 289+ A493 1C                                   inc e
 290+ A494 C9                                   ret
 291+ A495
 292+ A495              ;min: 456cc
 293+ A495              ;max: 536cc
 294+ A495              ;avg: 496cc
 295+ A495 06 08        div_fixed88_sub:        ld b,8
 296+ A497 17           BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3:      rla
 297+ A498 ED 6A                                adc hl,hl
 298+ A49A 19                                   add hl,de
 299+ A49B 38 02                                jr c,$+4
 300+ A49D ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 301+ A49F 10 F6                                djnz BC_Div_DE_88_lbl3
 302+ A4A1 8F                                   adc a,a
 303+ A4A2 C9                                   ret
 304+ A4A3
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_divide.asm
 851  A4A3                  INCLUDE "./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
   1+ A4A3              asm_tis2:
   2+ A4A3              ; ">TIS2 A = (A / Q * 96) so A = -96 ---- 96  range "
   3+ A4A3              ; ">DOES NOT DO SIGNED YET"
   4+ A4A3 F5           	push af
   5+ A4A4 E6 7F            and SignMask8Bit
   6+ A4A6 57           	ld d,a				;; d = A
   7+ A4A7 3A 50 94     	ld a,(varQ)
   8+ A4AA 5F           	ld e,a
   9+ A4AB 7A           	ld a,d
  10+ A4AC BB           	cp e
  11+ A4AD 30 11        	jr nc, .tis2_set96	;; jump if a >= Q
  12+ A4AF 1E 60        	ld e, 96
  13+ A4B1 ED 30        	mul				; de = d * 96 (also a * 96 )
  14+ A4B3 EB           	ex de,hl
  15+ A4B4 3A 50 94     	ld a,(varQ)
  16+ A4B7 4F           	ld c,a
  17+ A4B8 CD 90 A3     	call asm_div16
  18+ A4BB F1           	pop af
  19+ A4BC E6 80        	and $80
  20+ A4BE B5           	or l
  21+ A4BF C9           	ret
  22+ A4C0              .tis2_set96:
  23+ A4C0 F1           	pop af
  24+ A4C1 E6 80        	and $80
  25+ A4C3 F6 96        	or $96
  26+ A4C5 C9           	ret
  27+ A4C6
  28+ A4C6
  29+ A4C6              asm_unit_vector:
  30+ A4C6              squareregfx:
  31+ A4C6 3A 74 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  32+ A4C9 57           	ld d,a
  33+ A4CA 5F           	ld e,a
  34+ A4CB ED 30        	mul
  35+ A4CD EB           	ex de,hl
  36+ A4CE              squareregfy:
  37+ A4CE 3A 76 C0     	ld a, (UBnkYScaled)
  38+ A4D1 57           	ld d,a
  39+ A4D2 5F           	ld e,a
  40+ A4D3 ED 30        	mul
  41+ A4D5 19           	add hl,de
  42+ A4D6              squareregfz:
  43+ A4D6 3A 78 C0     	ld a, (UBnkZScaled)
  44+ A4D9 57           	ld d,a
  45+ A4DA 5F           	ld e,a
  46+ A4DB ED 30        	mul
  47+ A4DD 19           	add hl,de
  48+ A4DE EB           	ex de,hl			; de de to number to root
  49+ A4DF              hlequsquareroot:
  50+ A4DF CD 93 A2     	call asm_sqrt		; hl = sqrt (fx^2 + fy^2 + fx^2)
  51+ A4E2 E5           	push hl				; save it for work 3 copies
  52+ A4E3 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  53+ A4E4 E5           	push hl				; save it for work
  54+ A4E5              normfx:
  55+ A4E5 3A 74 C0     	ld a,(UBnkXScaled)
  56+ A4E8 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #1
  57+ A4E9 7D           	ld a,l				; we assume only l had worthwhile data but could spill into h
  58+ A4EA 4F           	ld c,a
  59+ A4EB CD A3 A4     	call asm_tis2
  60+ A4EE 32 74 C0     	ld (UBnkXScaled),a
  61+ A4F1              normfy:
  62+ A4F1 3A 76 C0     	ld a,(UBnkYScaled)
  63+ A4F4 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  64+ A4F5 7D           	ld a,l
  65+ A4F6 4F           	ld c,a
  66+ A4F7 CD A3 A4     	call asm_tis2
  67+ A4FA 32 76 C0     	ld (UBnkYScaled),a
  68+ A4FD              normfz:
  69+ A4FD 3A 78 C0     	ld a,(UBnkZScaled)
  70+ A500 E1           	pop hl				; get copy #2
  71+ A501 7D           	ld a,l
  72+ A502 4F           	ld c,a
  73+ A503 CD A3 A4     	call asm_tis2
  74+ A506 32 78 C0     	ld (UBnkZScaled),a
  75+ A509              asm_unit_vector_end:
  76+ A509 C9           	ret
  77+ A50A
# file closed: ./Maths/asm_unitvector.asm
 852  A50A                  INCLUDE "./Maths/compare16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/compare16.asm
   1+ A50A              compare16HLDE:
   2+ A50A              ; Input:
   3+ A50A              ;       HL = 1st value
   4+ A50A              ;       DE = 2nd value
   5+ A50A              ; Output:
   6+ A50A              ;       CF, ZF = results of comparison:
   7+ A50A              ;
   8+ A50A              ;               CF      ZF      Result
   9+ A50A              ;               -----------------------------------
  10+ A50A              ;               0       0       HL > DE
  11+ A50A              ;               0       1       HL == DE
  12+ A50A              ;               1       0       HL < DE
  13+ A50A              ;               1       1       Impossible
  14+ A50A              ;
  15+ A50A E5           		push    hl
  16+ A50B A7           		and     a
  17+ A50C ED 52        		sbc     hl,de
  18+ A50E E1           		pop     hl
  19+ A50F C9           		ret
  20+ A510
# file closed: ./Maths/compare16.asm
 853  A510                  INCLUDE "./Maths/negate16.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/negate16.asm
   1+ A510              ;;----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
   2+ A510              ;; 16-bit negate
   3+ A510              negate16:
   4+ A510              negate16hl:
   5+ A510                      ; Input:
   6+ A510                      ;       HL = value
   7+ A510                      ; Output:
   8+ A510                      ;       HL = -value
   9+ A510                      ; Destroys:
  10+ A510                      ;       AF
  11+ A510                      ;
  12+ A510 AF           	xor 	a
  13+ A511 95           	sub 	l
  14+ A512 6F           	ld 		l,a
  15+ A513 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  16+ A514 94           	sub 	h
  17+ A515 67           	ld 		h,a
  18+ A516 C9           	ret
  19+ A517
  20+ A517              negate16de:
  21+ A517 AF           	xor 	a
  22+ A518 93           	sub 	e
  23+ A519 5F           	ld 		e,a
  24+ A51A 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  25+ A51B 92           	sub 	d
  26+ A51C 57           	ld 		d,a
  27+ A51D C9           	ret
  28+ A51E
  29+ A51E              negate16bc:
  30+ A51E AF           	xor 	a
  31+ A51F 91           	sub 	c
  32+ A520 4F           	ld 		c,a
  33+ A521 9F           	sbc 	a,a
  34+ A522 90           	sub 	b
  35+ A523 47           	ld 		b,a
  36+ A524 C9           	ret
  37+ A525
  38+ A525
  39+ A525              macronegate16hl:	MACRO
  40+ A525 ~            					xor 	a
  41+ A525 ~            					sub 	l
  42+ A525 ~            					ld 		l,a
  43+ A525 ~            					sbc 	a,a
  44+ A525 ~            					sub 	h
  45+ A525 ~            					ld 		h,a
  46+ A525              					ENDM
  47+ A525
  48+ A525              macronegate16de:	MACRO
