  50+ A525 ~                                sub 	e
  51+ A525 ~                                ld 		e,a
  52+ A525 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  53+ A525 ~                                sub 	d
  54+ A525 ~                                ld 		d,a
  55+ A525              					ENDM
  56+ A525              macronegate16bc:	MACRO
  57+ A525 ~            					xor 	a
  58+ A525 ~                                sub 	c
  59+ A525 ~                                ld 		c,a
  60+ A525 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  61+ A525 ~                                sub 	b
  62+ A525 ~                                ld 		b,a
  63+ A525              					ENDM
  64+ A525
  65+ A525              macronegate16ix:	MACRO
  66+ A525 ~            					xor 	a
  67+ A525 ~                                sub 	ixl
  68+ A525 ~                                ld 		ixl,a
  69+ A525 ~                                sbc 	a,a
  70+ A525 ~                                sub 	ixh
  71+ A525 ~                                ld 		ixh,a
  72+ A525              					ENDM
# file closed: ./Maths/negate16.asm
 854  A525                  INCLUDE "./Maths/normalise96.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
   1+ A525 DD 68        AequAdivDmul96Unsg:     ld			ixl,b						; Get sign bit passed in as bit 7 in b
   2+ A527                                      JumpIfAGTENusng d, TISXAccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
   2+ A527 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ A528 D2 3D A5    >                        jp		nc,TISXAccGTEQ
   3+ A52B 4F                                   ld			c,a
   4+ A52C CD 82 A3                             call		asm_div8
   5+ A52F 79                                   ld			a,c							; a = result
   6+ A530 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 4
   7+ A532 47                                   ld			b,a							; t = t /4
   8+ A533 CB 3F                                srl			a							; result / 8
   9+ A535 80                                   add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  10+ A536 47                                   ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  11+ A537 DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl						; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  12+ A539 E6 80                                and			$80							; recover sign only
  13+ A53B B0                                   or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  14+ A53C C9                                   ret
  15+ A53D              TISXAccGTEQ:
  16+ A53D              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  17+ A53D DD 7D                                ld			a,ixl     					; get saved sign from b
  18+ A53F E6 80                                and			$80							; copy of Acc
  19+ A541 F6 60                                or			$60							; unity
  20+ A543 C9                                   ret
  21+ A544
  22+ A544
  23+ A544
  24+ A544
  25+ A544              normaliseXX1596fast:
  26+ A544                  ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  27+ A544 3A 74 C0     	ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  28+ A547 DD 67        	ld		ixh,a               ; ixh = signed x component
  29+ A549 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; a = unsigned version
  30+ A54B              N96SQX:
  31+ A54B              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  31+ A54B 5F          >			ld	e,a
  31+ A54C 57          >			ld  d,a
  31+ A54D ED 30       >			mul
  32+ A54F 62           	ld		h,d					; h == varR d = varO e= varA
  33+ A550 6B           	ld		l,e					; l == varQ  															:: so HL = XX15[x]^2
  34+ A551              N96SQY:
  35+ A551 3A 75 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  36+ A554 DD 6F        	ld		ixl,a               ; ixl = signed y componet
  37+ A556 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; = abs
  38+ A558              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[y]^2
  38+ A558 5F          >			ld	e,a
  38+ A559 57          >			ld  d,a
  38+ A55A ED 30       >			mul
  39+ A55C 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2
  40+ A55D              N96SQZ:
  41+ A55D 3A 76 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
  42+ A560 FD 67        	ld		iyh,a               ; iyh = signed
  43+ A562 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit                 ; unsigned
  44+ A564              	inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2		:: so DE = XX15[z]^2
  44+ A564 5F          >			ld	e,a
  44+ A565 57          >			ld  d,a
  44+ A566 ED 30       >			mul
  45+ A568              N96SQADD:
  46+ A568 19           	add		hl,de				; hl = XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2
  47+ A569 EB           	ex		de,hl				; hl => de ready for square root
  48+ A56A              N96SQRT:
  49+ A56A CD 93 A2     	call	asm_sqrt			; hl = sqrt(XX15[x]^2 + XX15[y]^2 + XX15[z]^2), we just are interested in l which is the new Q
  50+ A56D              N96NORMX:
  51+ A56D 3A 74 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+0)
  52+ A570 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  53+ A572 4F           	ld		c,a
  54+ A573 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  55+ A574 CD 51 A7     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  56+ A577 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  57+ A578 DD 7C        	ld		a,ixh			;++SGN
  58+ A57A E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  59+ A57C B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  60+ A57D 32 74 C0     	ld		(XX15+0),a
  61+ A580              N96NORMY:
  62+ A580 3A 75 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+1)
  63+ A583 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  64+ A585 4F           	ld		c,a
  65+ A586 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  66+ A587 CD 51 A7     	call	AequAdivDmul96     	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  67+ A58A 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  68+ A58B DD 7D        	ld		a,ixl			;++SGN
  69+ A58D E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  70+ A58F B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  71+ A590 32 75 C0     	ld		(XX15+1),a
  72+ A593              N96NORMZ:
  73+ A593 3A 76 C0     	ld		a,(XX15+2)
  74+ A596 E6 7F        	and		SignMask8Bit
  75+ A598 4F           	ld		c,a
  76+ A599 55           	ld		d,l					; Q(i.e. l) => D, later we can just pop into de
  77+ A59A CD 51 A7     	call	AequAdivDmul96	; does not use HL so we can retain it
  78+ A59D 47           	ld		b,a				;++SGN
  79+ A59E FD 7C        	ld		a,iyh			;++SGN
  80+ A5A0 E6 80        	and		$80				;++SGN
  81+ A5A2 B0           	or		b				;++SGN
  82+ A5A3 32 76 C0     	ld		(XX15+2),a
  83+ A5A6 C9           	ret
  84+ A5A7
  85+ A5A7              ; .NORM	\ -> &3BD6 \ Normalize 3-vector length of XX15
  86+ A5A7 3A 74 C0     normaliseXX1596:        ld		a,(XX15)		    ; XX15+0
  87+ A5AA                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  87+ A5AA 5F          >			ld	e,a
  87+ A5AB 57          >			ld  d,a
  87+ A5AC ED 30       >			mul
  88+ A5AE 7A                                   ld		a,d
  89+ A5AF 32 51 94                             ld		(varR),a			; R	 \ hi sum later use b
  90+ A5B2 7B                                   ld		a,e
  91+ A5B3 32 50 94                             ld		(varQ),a			; Q	 \ lo sum later use c
  92+ A5B6 32 F5 93                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum later just drop
  93+ A5B9 3A 75 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
  94+ A5BC                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
  94+ A5BC 5F          >			ld	e,a
  94+ A5BD 57          >			ld  d,a
  94+ A5BE ED 30       >			mul
  95+ A5C0 7A                                   ld		a,d
  96+ A5C1 32 70 94                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
  97+ A5C4 7B                                   ld		a,e
  98+ A5C5 32 F5 93                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
  99+ A5C8 21 50 94                             ld		hl,varQ
 100+ A5CB 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 101+ A5CC 32 50 94                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q
 102+ A5CF 3A 70 94                             ld		a,(varT)			;
 103+ A5D2 21 51 94                             ld		hl,varR
 104+ A5D5 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				;  R
 105+ A5D6 32 51 94                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 106+ A5D9 3A 76 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+2)			; Note comments say \ ZZ15+2  should be \ XX15+2 as per code
 107+ A5DC                                      inline_squde				; Use inline square for speed	objective is SQUA \ P.A =A7*A7 x^2
 107+ A5DC 5F          >			ld	e,a
 107+ A5DD 57          >			ld  d,a
 107+ A5DE ED 30       >			mul
 108+ A5E0 7A                                   ld		a,d
 109+ A5E1 32 70 94                             ld		(varT),a			; T	 \ hi sum
 110+ A5E4 7B                                   ld		a,e
 111+ A5E5 32 F5 93                             ld		(varP),a			; P	 \ lo sum
 112+ A5E8 21 50 94                             ld		hl,varQ
 113+ A5EB 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +Q
 114+ A5EC 32 50 94                             ld		(varQ),a			; =>Q  xlo2 + ylo2 + zlo2
 115+ A5EF 3A 70 94                             ld		a,(varT)			; T temp Hi
 116+ A5F2 21 51 94                             ld		hl,varR
 117+ A5F5 8E                                   adc		a,(hl)				; +R
 118+ A5F6 32 51 94                             ld		(varR),a			; R
 119+ A5F9 CD B6 A2                             call	sqrtQR				; Q = SQR(Qlo.Rhi) Q <~127
 120+ A5FC 3A 74 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+0)
 121+ A5FF CD 4B A7                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 122+ A602 32 74 C0                             ld		(XX15+0),a
 123+ A605 3A 75 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 124+ A608 CD 4B A7                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 125+ A60B 32 75 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 126+ A60E 3A 75 C0                             ld		a,(XX15+1)
 127+ A611 CD 4B A7                             call	AequAdivQmul96		;  TIS2 \ *96/Q
 128+ A614 32 75 C0                             ld		(XX15+1),a
 129+ A617 C9                                   ret
 130+ A618
 131+ A618
# file closed: ./Maths/normalise96.asm
 855  A618                  INCLUDE "./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
   1+ A618              ;Number in hl to decimal ASCII
   2+ A618              ;Thanks to z80 Bits
   3+ A618              ;inputs:	hl = number to ASCII
   4+ A618              ;example: hl=300 outputs '00300'
   5+ A618              ;destroys: af, bc, hl, de used
   6+ A618              DispHLtoDE:
   7+ A618              ; "DispHL, writes HL to DE address"
   8+ A618 01 F0 D8     	ld	bc,-10000
   9+ A61B CD 31 A6     	call	Num1
  10+ A61E 01 18 FC     	ld	bc,-1000
  11+ A621 CD 31 A6     	call	Num1
  12+ A624 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  13+ A627 CD 31 A6     	call	Num1
  14+ A62A 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  15+ A62C CD 31 A6     	call	Num1
  16+ A62F 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  17+ A631              Num1:
  18+ A631 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  19+ A633              .Num2:
  20+ A633 3C           	inc	a
  21+ A634 09           	add	hl,bc
  22+ A635 38 FC        	jr	c,.Num2
  23+ A637 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  24+ A639 12           	ld	(de),a
  25+ A63A 13           	inc	de
  26+ A63B C9           	ret
  27+ A63C
  28+ A63C              DispAtoDE:
  29+ A63C 26 00        	ld h,0
  30+ A63E 6F           	ld l,a
  31+ A63F C3 18 A6     	jp DispHLtoDE
  32+ A642
  33+ A642              DispPriceAtoDE:
  34+ A642 26 00        	ld h,0
  35+ A644 6F           	ld l,a
  36+ A645 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  37+ A648 CD 58 A6     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  38+ A64B 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  39+ A64D CD 31 A6     	call	Num1
  40+ A650 3E 2E        	ld		a,'.'					; we could assume preformat but
  41+ A652 12           	ld		(de),a					; we can optimse that later TODO
  42+ A653 13           	inc		de						; with just an inc De
  43+ A654 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  44+ A656 18 D9        	jr		Num1
  45+ A658              .NumLeadBlank1:
  46+ A658 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  47+ A65A              .NumLeadBlank2:
  48+ A65A 3C           	inc	a
  49+ A65B 09           	add	hl,bc
  50+ A65C 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  51+ A65E FE 30        	cp	'0'
  52+ A660 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  53+ A662              .Blank:
  54+ A662 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  55+ A664              .DontBlank:
  56+ A664 ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  57+ A666 12           	ld	(de),a
  58+ A667 13           	inc	de
  59+ A668 C9           	ret
  60+ A669
  61+ A669              DispQtyAtoDE:
  62+ A669 FE 00        	cp	0
  63+ A66B 28 23        	jr	z,.NoStock
  64+ A66D 26 00        	ld h,0
  65+ A66F 6F           	ld l,a
  66+ A670 01 9C FF     	ld	bc,-100
  67+ A673 CD 7F A6     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  68+ A676 0E F6        	ld	c,-10
  69+ A678 CD 7F A6     	call	.NumLeadBlank1
  70+ A67B 0E FF        	ld	c,-1
  71+ A67D 18 B2        	jr		Num1
  72+ A67F              .NumLeadBlank1:
  73+ A67F 3E 2F        	ld	a,'0'-1
  74+ A681              .NumLeadBlank2:
  75+ A681 3C           	inc	a
  76+ A682 09           	add	hl,bc
  77+ A683 38 FC        	jr	c,.NumLeadBlank2
  78+ A685 FE 30        	cp	'0'
  79+ A687 20 02        	jr	nz,.DontBlank
  80+ A689              .Blank:
  81+ A689 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  82+ A68B              .DontBlank:
  83+ A68B ED 42        	sbc	hl,bc
  84+ A68D 12           	ld	(de),a
  85+ A68E 13           	inc	de
  86+ A68F C9           	ret
  87+ A690              .NoStock:
  88+ A690 3E 20        	ld	a,' '
  89+ A692 12           	ld	(de),a
  90+ A693 13           	inc	de
  91+ A694 12           	ld	(de),a
  92+ A695 13           	inc	de
  93+ A696 3E 2D        	ld	a,'-'
  94+ A698 12           	ld	(de),a
  95+ A699 13           	inc de
  96+ A69A C9           	ret
  97+ A69B
  98+ A69B
  99+ A69B              ;### CLCN32 -> Converts 32Bit-Value in ASCII-String (terminated by 0)
 100+ A69B              ;### Input      DE,IX=32bit value, IY=destination address
 101+ A69B              ;### Output     IY=last char in destination string
 102+ A69B              ;### Destroyed AF,BC,DE,HL,IX
 103+ A69B 01 00 00 00  clcn32t dw 1,0,     10,0,     100,0,     1000,0,       10000,0
 103+ A69F 0A 00 00 00
 103+ A6A3 64 00 00 00
 103+ A6A7 E8 03 00 00
 103+ A6AB 10 27 00 00
 104+ A6AF A0 86 01 00          dw $86a0,1, $4240,$0f, $9680,$98, $e100,$05f5, $ca00,$3b9a
 104+ A6B3 40 42 0F 00
 104+ A6B7 80 96 98 00
 104+ A6BB 00 E1 F5 05
 104+ A6BF 00 CA 9A 3B
 105+ A6C3 00 00 00 00  clcn32z ds 4
 106+ A6C7
 107+ A6C7              ; As per display but shifts final digit by 1 and puts in "." for 1 decimal place
 108+ A6C7 CD D6 A6     DispDEIXtoIY1DP:        call    DispDEIXtoIY
 109+ A6CA FD 7E 00                             ld      a,(IY+0)
 110+ A6CD FD 77 01                             ld      (IY+1),a
 111+ A6D0 3E 2E                                ld      a,"."
 112+ A6D2 FD 77 00                             ld      (IY+0),a
 113+ A6D5 C9                                   ret
 114+ A6D6
 115+ A6D6 DD 22 C3 A6  DispDEIXtoIY:           ld (clcn32z),ix
 116+ A6DA ED 53 C5 A6                          ld (clcn32z+2),de
 117+ A6DE DD 21 BF A6                          ld ix,clcn32t+36
 118+ A6E2 06 09                                ld b,9
 119+ A6E4 0E 00                                ld c,0
 120+ A6E6 3E 30        .clcn321:               ld a,'0'
 121+ A6E8 B7                                   or a
 122+ A6E9 DD 5E 00     .clcn322:               ld e,(ix+0)
 123+ A6EC DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 124+ A6EF 2A C3 A6                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 125+ A6F2 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 126+ A6F4 22 C3 A6                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 127+ A6F7 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 128+ A6FA DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 129+ A6FD 2A C5 A6                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 130+ A700 ED 52                                sbc hl,de
 131+ A702 22 C5 A6                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 132+ A705 38 04                                jr c,.clcn325
 133+ A707 0C                                   inc c
 134+ A708 3C                                   inc a
 135+ A709 18 DE                                jr .clcn322
 136+ A70B DD 5E 00     .clcn325:               ld e,(ix+0)
 137+ A70E DD 56 01                             ld d,(ix+1)
 138+ A711 2A C3 A6                             ld hl,(clcn32z)
 139+ A714 19                                   add hl,de
 140+ A715 22 C3 A6                             ld (clcn32z),hl
 141+ A718 DD 5E 02                             ld e,(ix+2)
 142+ A71B DD 56 03                             ld d,(ix+3)
 143+ A71E 2A C5 A6                             ld hl,(clcn32z+2)
 144+ A721 ED 5A                                adc hl,de
 145+ A723 22 C5 A6                             ld (clcn32z+2),hl
 146+ A726 11 FC FF                             ld de,-4
 147+ A729 DD 19                                add ix,de
 148+ A72B 0C                                   inc c
 149+ A72C 0D                                   dec c
 150+ A72D 28 05                                jr z,.clcn323
 151+ A72F FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 152+ A732 FD 23                                inc iy
 153+ A734 10 B0        .clcn323:               djnz .clcn321
 154+ A736 3A C3 A6                             ld a,(clcn32z)
 155+ A739 C6 30                                add A,'0'
 156+ A73B FD 77 00                             ld (iy+0),a
 157+ A73E FD 36 01 00                          ld (iy+1),0
 158+ A742 C9                                   ret
 159+ A743
# file closed: ./Maths/binary_to_decimal.asm
 856  A743              ;INCLUDE "badd_ll38.asm"
 857  A743              ;;INCLUDE "XX12equXX15byXX16.asm"
 858  A743                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
   1+ A743
   2+ A743              ; USES 			A DE BC
   3+ A743              ; DOES NOT USE 	HL
   4+ A743              TIS2962C:		; two's compliment entry point, exits not 2's compliment
   5+ A743 CB 7F        	bit			7,a
   6+ A745 28 04        	jr			z,AequAdivQmul96
   7+ A747 ED 44        	neg										; revers 2s'c and just set neg bit
   8+ A749 CB FF        	set			7,a
   9+ A74B              ; Note negative numbers are bit 7 set not 2's compliment
  10+ A74B              AequAdivQmul96:								; TIS296:			; .tis2 A = A /Q *96 (or A = A * 3/8 * Q) Reduce Acc in NORM routine i.e. *96/Q clamps at +- 96
  11+ A74B              TIS2:
  12+ A74B 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc
  13+ A74C 3A 50 94     	ld			a,(varQ)
  14+ A74F 57           	ld			d,a							; d = varQ
  15+ A750 79           	ld			a,c							; recover a
  16+ A751              AequAdivDmul96:
  17+ A751 4F           	ld			c,a							; copy of Acc as we need the sign, alternate entry point assuming D preloaded, wastes an "ld c,a" but simplifies code
  18+ A752 E6 7F        	and			SignMask8Bit				; ignore sign
  19+ A754              	JumpIfAGTENusng d, TIS2AccGTEQ			; if A >= Q then return with a 1 (unity i.e. 96) with the correct sign
  19+ A754 BA          >                        cp     d
  19+ A755 D2 75 A7    >                        jp		nc,TIS2AccGTEQ
  20+ A758 06 FE        	ld			b,$FE						; division roll (replaced varT)
  21+ A75A              TIS2RollTLoop:									; .TIL2	; roll T
  22+ A75A CB 27        	sla			a
  23+ A75C              	JumpIfALTNusng d,TIS2SkipSub            ; a < d so don;t subtract
  23+ A75C BA          >                        cp      d
  23+ A75D DA 7B A7    >                        jp		c,TIS2SkipSub
  24+ A760 9A           	sbc			a,d							; do subtraction with carry
  25+ A761 37           	scf
  26+ A762 CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  27+ A764 38 F4        	jr			c,TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  28+ A766              TIS2SKIPCont:
  29+ A766 78           	ld			a,b							; T
  30+ A767 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 2
  31+ A769 CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 4
  32+ A76B 47           	ld			b,a							; t = t /4
  33+ A76C CB 3F        	srl			a							; result / 8
  34+ A76E 80           	add			a,b							; result /8 + result /4
  35+ A76F 47           	ld			b,a							; b = 3/8*Acc (max = 96)
  36+ A770 79           	ld			a,c							; copy of Acc to look at sign bit
  37+ A771 E6 80        	and			$80							; recover sign only
  38+ A773 B0           	or			b							; now put b back in so we have a leading sign bit (note not 2's compliment)
  39+ A774 C9           	ret
  40+ A775              TIS2AccGTEQ:
  41+ A775              ;TI4:										;\ clean to +/- unity
  42+ A775 79           	ld			a,c
  43+ A776 E6 80        	and			$80							; copy of Acc
  44+ A778 F6 60        	or			$60							; unity
  45+ A77A C9           	ret
  46+ A77B              TIS2SkipSub:
  47+ A77B B7           	or			a
  48+ A77C CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  49+ A77E 38 DA        	jr			c,TIS2RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  50+ A780 C3 66 A7     	jp			TIS2SKIPCont
  51+ A783
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAdivQmul96-TIS2.asm
 859  A783                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
   1+ A783              fmltu:
   2+ A783              AequAmulQdiv256:
   3+ A783              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=A*Q/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   4+ A783 57           	ld	d,a
   5+ A784 3A 50 94     	ld	a,(varQ)
   6+ A787 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ A788 ED 30        	mul
   8+ A78A 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   9+ A78B C9           	ret
  10+ A78C
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequAmulQdiv256-FMLTU.asm
 860  A78C                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
   1+ A78C              ; "DV42,DV42IYH DE = P.R, c = R"
   2+ A78C              DV42IYH:									; as per DV42 but using iyl for Y reg
   3+ A78C 21 24 97     		ld		hl,varDustZ
   4+ A78F FD 7D        		ld		a,iyl
   5+ A791 ED 31        		add		hl,a
   6+ A793 7E           		ld		a,(hl)
   7+ A794 C3 A0 A7     		jp		DV41
   8+ A797              DV42:										; travel step of dust particle front/rear
   9+ A797 21 24 97     		ld		hl,varDustZ
  10+ A79A 3A E3 93     		ld		a,(regY)
  11+ A79D ED 31        		add		hl,a
  12+ A79F 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; a = SZ[y]
  13+ A7A0              DV41:										; P.R = speed/ (ZZ/8) dust left/right
  14+ A7A0 5F           		ld		e,a							; using E as Q var replacement
  15+ A7A1 3A 4C 94     		ld		a,(DELTA)					; DELTA \ speed, how far has dust moved based on its z-coord.
  16+ A7A4              DVID4:										; P-R=A/Qunsg  \P.R = A/Q unsigned called by Hall
  17+ A7A4 06 08        		ld		b,8							; counter
  18+ A7A6 CB 27        		sla		a							;
  19+ A7A8 57           		ld		d,a							; use d for - p = delta * 2
  20+ A7A9 AF           		xor		a
  21+ A7AA              DVL4:										; counter x loop (b reg)
  22+ A7AA CB 17        		rl		a							; a = a * 2
  23+ A7AC 38 03        		jr		c,DV8						; jump on carry
  24+ A7AE BB           		cp		e							; var Q
  25+ A7AF 38 02        		jr		c,DV5						; skip subtraction
  26+ A7B1              DV8:
  27+ A7B1 9B           		sbc		a,e							; a = a - q (with carry)
  28+ A7B2 37           		scf									;  carry gets set
  29+ A7B3              DV5:										; skipped subtraction
  30+ A7B3 CB 12        		rl		d							; d (P hi)
  31+ A7B5 10 F3        		djnz	DVL4						; dec b and loop loop X, hi left in P.
  32+ A7B7              .CalcRemainder:								; BFRDIV R=A*256/Q
  33+ A7B7              ; Note we are not going to call LL28+4 but inline code here:
  34+ A7B7 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; remainder R for AofQ *256/Q
  35+ A7B9 4F           		ld		c,a							; use c as R var
  36+ A7BA              .RollRemainder:
  37+ A7BA CB 27        		sla		a
  38+ A7BC 38 11        		jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  39+ A7BE B8           		cp		b							; a < q?
  40+ A7BF 30 01        		jr		nc,.DontSBC
  41+ A7C1              .DoSBC:										; a is < q
  42+ A7C1 98           		sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  43+ A7C2              .DontSBC:
  44+ A7C2 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1
  45+ A7C4 38 F4        		jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  46+ A7C6 79           		ld		a,c
  47+ A7C7 32 51 94     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  48+ A7CA 7A           		ld		a,d
  49+ A7CB 32 F5 93     		ld		(varP),a
  50+ A7CE C9           		ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  51+ A7CF              .Reduce:									; a geneated a carry
  52+ A7CF 98           		sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  53+ A7D0 37           		scf									; set carry flag for rl
  54+ A7D1 CB 11        		rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  55+ A7D3 38 E5        		jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  56+ A7D5 79           		ld		a,c
  57+ A7D6 32 51 94     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  58+ A7D9 7A           		ld		a,d
  59+ A7DA 32 F5 93     		ld		(varP),a
  60+ A7DD C9           		ret
  61+ A7DE              .AnswerTooBig:
  62+ A7DE 0E FF        		ld		c,$FF						; arse its too big
  63+ A7E0 79           		ld		a,c
  64+ A7E1 32 51 94     		ld		(varR),a					; for backwards compat
  65+ A7E4 7A           		ld		a,d
  66+ A7E5 32 F5 93     		ld		(varP),a
  67+ A7E8 C9           		ret
  68+ A7E9
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/PRequSpeedDivZZdiv8-DV42-DV42IYH.asm
 861  A7E9                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
   1+ A7E9
   2+ A7E9              asm_defmutl:
   3+ A7E9              AequDmulEdiv256usgn:
   4+ A7E9              ; "ASM_FMUTKL .FMLTU	\ -> &2847  \ A=D*E/256unsg  Fast multiply"
   5+ A7E9 ED 30        	mul
   6+ A7EB 7A           	ld	a,d				; we get only the high byte which is like doing a /256 if we think of a as low
   7+ A7EC C9           	ret
   8+ A7ED
   9+ A7ED
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/AequDmulEdiv256usgn-DEFMUTL.asm
 862  A7ED              ;INCLUDE "AP2equAPmulQunsgEorP-MLTU2.asm"
 863  A7ED              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulQUnsg-MULTU.asm"
 864  A7ED              ;INCLUDE "APequPmulX-MU11.asm"
 865  A7ED                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
   1+ A7ED              APequQmulA:
   2+ A7ED              asm_mult1:
   3+ A7ED              ; "ASM_MULT1 (DE) A(hi).P(lo) = Q * A first part of MAD, multiply and add. Visited Quite often. A=hi P = lo also returns result in DE"
   4+ A7ED FE 00        	cp	0
   5+ A7EF 28 1F        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its Q * 0
   6+ A7F1 5F           	ld	e,a
   7+ A7F2 3A 50 94     	ld	a,(varQ)
   8+ A7F5 57           	ld	d,a
   9+ A7F6 FE 00        	cp	0				; compare a
  10+ A7F8 28 16        	jr	z,.mul0			; quick exit if its 0 * a
  11+ A7FA AB           	xor	e				; -- = + +- = - -+ = - ++ = +
  12+ A7FB E6 80        	and $80				; get the resultant sign and save into b
  13+ A7FD 47           	ld	b,a
  14+ A7FE 7A           	ld	a,d
  15+ A7FF E6 7F        	and	SignMask8Bit	; now strip off sign bits
  16+ A801 57           	ld	d,a
  17+ A802 7B           	ld	a,e
  18+ A803 E6 7F        	and SignMask8Bit
  19+ A805 5F           	ld	e,a
  20+ A806 ED 30        	mul					; zxn de = d * e
  21+ A808 7B           	ld	a,e
  22+ A809 32 F5 93     	ld	(varP),a		; p = lo
  23+ A80C 7A           	ld	a,d				; a = hi
  24+ A80D B0           	or	b				; de goes to a and varP also re-do sign bit
  25+ A80E 57           	ld	d,a				; we will work with de having result as we may bin vars later
  26+ A80F C9           	ret
  27+ A810              .mul0:
  28+ A810 AF           	xor	a
  29+ A811 32 F5 93     	ld	(varP),a
  30+ A814 57           	ld	d,a
  31+ A815 5F           	ld  e,a
  32+ A816 C9           	ret
  33+ A817
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/APequQmulA-MULT1.asm
 866  A817                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
   1+ A817              baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
   2+ A817              SAEquSRPlusAQ:
   3+ A817              ; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
   4+ A817              ;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
   5+ A817              ; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
   6+ A817              ; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
   7+ A817              ; so need to fix the issue with carry flag not returning a fault correctly
   8+ A817              LL38:
   9+ A817              ;	ld		d,a
  10+ A817              ;	ld		a,(varQ)
  11+ A817              ;	ld		e,a
  12+ A817              ;	ld		a,(varS)
  13+ A817              ;	ld		h,a
  14+ A817              ;	ld		a,(varR)
  15+ A817              ;	ld		l,a
  16+ A817              ;	call	ADDHLDESignedv3
  17+ A817              ;	ld		a,h
  18+ A817              ;	ld		(varS),a
  19+ A817              ;	ld		a,l
  20+ A817              ;	ret
  21+ A817              ; calculation table
  22+ A817              ;   R     Q    Op            Sign calc
  23+ A817              ;	10    5    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  24+ A817              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  25+ A817              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  26+ A817              ;	-10  -5    ABS Add       -    sign same add R sign
  27+ A817              ;   5    10    Add           +    sign same add R sign
  28+ A817              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  29+ A817              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  30+ A817              ;   -5   -10   ABS  add      -    sign same add R sign
  31+ A817
  32+ A817              ;   -10   5    ABS Sub       -    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  33+ A817              ;   10   -5    ABS sub       +    sign diff ABS R > S sub R sign
  34+ A817              ;   -5   10    Swap ABS SUB  +    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB Q sign
  35+ A817              ;   5    -10   swap ABS Sub  -    sign diff ABS Q > R swap SUB R sign
  36+ A817
  37+ A817
  38+ A817              ; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  39+ A817 21 52 94     	ld		hl,varS							;
  40+ A81A AE           	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  41+ A81B FA 26 A8     	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  42+ A81E 3A 50 94     	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  43+ A821 21 51 94     	ld		hl,varR
  44+ A824 86           	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  45+ A825 C9           	ret										; Done carry set if overflow
  46+ A826              .LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
  47+ A826 3A 51 94     	ld		a,(varR)						; a = R
  48+ A829 21 50 94     	ld		hl,varQ                         ; Q
  49+ A82C              ;--	JumpIfALTMemHLusng LL39SwapSubtraction	; if a < (hl) then do LL39SwapSubtraction
  50+ A82C              	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
  50+ A82C B7          >                        or a
  51+ A82D 9E           	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q which as R >= Q will always be a positive result
  52+ A82E 38 01            jr      c,.LL39SignCorrection
  53+ A830              ;--    jr      a,.LL39ResultZero
  54+ A830              ;--   JumpIfNegative LL39SignCorrection		; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
  55+ A830              ;--	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
  56+ A830 C9           	ret
  57+ A831              .LL39SignCorrection:
  58+ A831 FE 00            cp      0                               ; if its 0 then neg will affect flag so we just zero result to save compute
  59+ A833 28 0E            jr      z,.LL39ResultZero
  60+ A835 ED 44            neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
  61+ A837 08           	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
  62+ A838 3A 52 94     	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
  63+ A83B EE 80        	xor		$80							    ;
  64+ A83D 32 52 94     	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
  65+ A840 08           	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
  66+ A841                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry as NEG instrunction sets it for non zero
  66+ A841 B7          >                        or a
  67+ A842 C9           	ret
  68+ A843              .LL39ResultZero:
  69+ A843 32 52 94         ld      (varS),a                        ; a is zero at this stage so set sign as well
  70+ A846                  ClearCarryFlag                          ; clear carry
  70+ A846 B7          >                        or a
  71+ A847 C9               ret
  72+ A848              ;--LL39SwapSubtraction:
  73+ A848              ;--	push	bc
  74+ A848              ;--	ld		b,a
  75+ A848              ;--	ld		a,(hl)
  76+ A848              ;--	sub		b
  77+ A848              ;--	pop		bc
  78+ A848              ;--	ex		af,af'							; do we flip here or negate. i think its flip as its overflowed unsigned
  79+ A848              ;--	ld		a,(varS)
  80+ A848              ;--	xor		$80
  81+ A848              ;--	ld		(varS),a
  82+ A848              ;--	ex		af,af'
  83+ A848              ;--	ret
  84+ A848
  85+ A848              ;;;;	baddll38:				;.LL38	\ -> &4812 \ BADD(S)A=R+Q(SA) \ byte add (subtract)   (Sign S)A = R + Q*(Sign from A^S)
  86+ A848              ;;;;; Calculate the following between sign-magnitude numbers:
  87+ A848              ;;;;;   (S A) = (S R) + (A Q)
  88+ A848              ;;;;; where the sign bytes only contain the sign bits, not magnitudes.
  89+ A848              ;;;;; note goes wrong at <-127 >128 so need 16 bit version
  90+ A848              ;;;;LL38:
  91+ A848              ;;;;; Calculate sign for Q from A and varS
  92+ A848              ;;;;	ld		hl,varS							;
  93+ A848              ;;;;	xor		(hl)							;  EOR &83		\ S	\ sign of operator is A xor S
  94+ A848              ;;;;	jp		m,.LL39Subtraction  			; if signs are different then we have subtraction
  95+ A848              ;;;;	ld		a,(varQ)						; Q	\ else addition, S already correct
  96+ A848              ;;;;	ld		hl,varR
  97+ A848              ;;;;	add		a,(hl)							; a = Q + R
  98+ A848              ;;;;	ret										; Done
  99+ A848              ;;;;.LL39Subtraction:							; 1 byte subtraction (S)A = R-Q
 100+ A848              ;;;;	ld		hl,varQ                         ;
 101+ A848              ;;;;	ld		a,(hl)
 102+ A848              ;;;;	JumpIfAGTENusng 128,LL39Sub16bit		; does this need to be 16 bit
 103+ A848              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)						;
 104+ A848              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag                          ; we need to not use carry (6502 is different that it uses the compliement)
 105+ A848              ;;;;	sbc		a,(hl)							; A = R - Q
 106+ A848              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection				; if there was underflow we have to correct sign
 107+ A848              ;;;;	or		a								; Clear carry flag to say result is correct
 108+ A848              ;;;;	ret
 109+ A848              ;;;;.SignCorrection:
 110+ A848              ;;;;    neg                                     ; flip A 2'c value to positive
 111+ A848              ;;;;	ex		af,af'							; save A temporarily
 112+ A848              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 113+ A848              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 114+ A848              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 115+ A848              ;;;;	ex		af,af'                          ; get back a which is the result
 116+ A848              ;;;;	ret
 117+ A848              ;;;;LL39Sub16Bit:
 118+ A848              ;;;;	ld		e,a
 119+ A848              ;;;;	ld		d,0
 120+ A848              ;;;;	ld		a,(varR)
 121+ A848              ;;;;	ld		l,a
 122+ A848              ;;;;	ld		h,0
 123+ A848              ;;;;	ClearCarryFlag
 124+ A848              ;;;;	sbc		hl,de
 125+ A848              ;;;;	jr		c,.SignCorrection16bit
 126+ A848              ;;;;	bit		7,h
 127+ A848              ;;;;	jr		z,.GoodToReturn
 128+ A848              ;;;;.Needtonegate:
 129+ A848              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 130+ A848              ;;;;.GoodToReturn
 131+ A848              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 132+ A848              ;;;;	or		a
 133+ A848              ;;;;	ret
 134+ A848              ;;;;.SignCorrection16bit:
 135+ A848              ;;;;	macronegate16hl
 136+ A848              ;;;;	ld		a,(varS)						; Flip Sign bit in varS
 137+ A848              ;;;;	xor		$80							    ;
 138+ A848              ;;;;	ld		(varS),a                        ; flip sign bit of a
 139+ A848              ;;;;	ld		a,l
 140+ A848              ;;;;	ret
 141+ A848
 142+ A848
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/badd_ll38.asm
 867  A848                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
   1+ A848              ; Note comparing hl vs iY, you need at least 3 incs or decs for hl to be slower
   2+ A848              ; it may be faster though if we can use hl to avoid memory actions if needed
   3+ A848              ; need to optimise mad as push hl pop hl and use de doesn't really improve speed
   4+ A848
   5+ A848
   6+ A848              moveship4Yreg:
   7+ A848 3A E3 93     		ld		a,(regY)
   8+ A84B 47           		ld		b,a
   9+ A84C              moveship4breg:
  10+ A84C              		; b = Y index, 9 = nosev, 15 = roofv 21 = sidev
  11+ A84C              MVS4PitchAlphaRollBeta:
  12+ A84C              MVS4:										;.MVS4	\ -> &52A1 \ Moveship4, Y is matrix row, pitch&roll update to coordinates
  13+ A84C 3A 0E 94     		ld		a,(ALPHA)					;  ALPHA
  14+ A84F 32 50 94     		ld		(varQ),a					; player ship's roll Q = Alpha
  15+ A852 21 0D C0     		ld		hl,UBnKxsgn
  16+ A855 78           		ld		a,b							; from
  17+ A856 ED 31        		add		hl,a
  18+ A858 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+2,Y
  19+ A859 32 51 94     		ld		(varR),a					; R  \ lo
  20+ A85C 23           		inc		hl
  21+ A85D 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+3,Y
  22+ A85E 32 52 94     		ld		(varS),a					; S  \ hi		SR = nosev_y (or axis y)
  23+ A861 2B           		dec		hl
  24+ A862 2B           		dec		hl
  25+ A863 2B           		dec		hl							;
  26+ A864 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+0,Y
  27+ A865 32 F5 93     		ld		(varP),a					; P  \ over-written	 P = nosevx lo
  28+ A868 23           		inc		hl
  29+ A869 7E           		ld		a,(hl)						; INWK+1,Y
  30+ A86A EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip sign  AP = nosevx * - 1
  31+ A86C CD 8D A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; MAD	\ DE = X.A = alpha*INWK+1,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  32+ A86F 23                   inc     hl
  33+ A870 23                   inc     hl
  34+ A871 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  35+ A872 2B                   dec     hl
  36+ A873 3A E2 93             ld      a,(regX)
  37+ A876 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-aX   \ their comment
  38+ A877 32 F5 93             ld      (varP),a                    ;  P
  39+ A87A 2B                   dec     hl
  40+ A87B 2B                   dec     hl
  41+ A87C 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+0,Y
  42+ A87D 32 51 94             ld      (varR),a                    ;  R	\ lo
  43+ A880 23                   inc     hl
  44+ A881 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ;  INWK+1,Y
  45+ A882 32 52 94             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  46+ A885 23                   inc     hl
  47+ A886 23                   inc     hl
  48+ A887 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  49+ A888 CD 8D A1             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = alpha*INWK+3,Y + INWK+0to1,Y
  50+ A88B 2B                   dec     hl
  51+ A88C 2B                   dec     hl
  52+ A88D 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+1,Y  \ hi
  53+ A88E 3A E2 93             ld      a,(regX)
  54+ A891 2B                   dec     hl
  55+ A892 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+0,Y  \ X=X+aY   \ their comment
  56+ A893 32 F5 93             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  57+ A896 3A 00 94             ld      a,(BETA)                    ; BETA
  58+ A899 32 50 94             ld      (varQ),a                    ; Q	\ player ship's pitch
  59+ A89C 23                   inc     hl
  60+ A89D 23                   inc     hl
  61+ A89E 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+2,Y
  62+ A89F 32 51 94             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  63+ A8A2 23                   inc     hl
  64+ A8A3 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  65+ A8A4 32 52 94             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  66+ A8A7 23                   inc     hl
  67+ A8A8 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  68+ A8A9 32 F5 93             ld      (varP),a                    ; P	\ lo
  69+ A8AC 23                   inc     hl
  70+ A8AD 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  71+ A8AE EE 80                xor     $80                         ; flip sign hi
  72+ A8B0 CD 8D A1             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A =-beta*INWK+5,Y + INWK+2to3,Y
  73+ A8B3 2B                   dec     hl
  74+ A8B4 2B                   dec     hl
  75+ A8B5 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+3,Y \ hi
  76+ A8B6 3A E2 93             ld      a,(regX)
  77+ A8B9 2B                   dec     hl
  78+ A8BA 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+2,Y \ Y=Y-bZ  \ their comment
  79+ A8BB 32 F5 93             ld      (varP),a                    ; P
  80+ A8BE 23                   inc     hl
  81+ A8BF 23                   inc     hl
  82+ A8C0 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+4,Y
  83+ A8C1 32 51 94             ld      (varR),a                    ; R	\ lo
  84+ A8C4 23                   inc     hl
  85+ A8C5 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+5,Y
  86+ A8C6 32 52 94             ld      (varS),a                    ; S	\ hi
  87+ A8C9 2B                   dec     hl
  88+ A8CA 2B                   dec     hl
  89+ A8CB 7E                   ld      a,(hl)                      ; INWK+3,Y
  90+ A8CC CD 8D A1             call    madXAequQmulAaddRS          ; MAD	\ X.A = beta*INWK+3,Y + INWK+4,5,Y
  91+ A8CF 23                   inc     hl
  92+ A8D0 23                   inc     hl
  93+ A8D1 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+5,Y \ hi
  94+ A8D2 3A E2 93             ld      a,(regX)
  95+ A8D5 2B                   dec     hl
  96+ A8D6 77                   ld      (hl),a                      ; INWK+4,Y \ Z=Z+bY   \ their comment
  97+ A8D7 C9                   ret
  98+ A8D8
  99+ A8D8
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/moveship4-MVS4.asm
 868  A8D8              ;INCLUDE "MoveShip5-MVS5.asm"
 869  A8D8              ;INCLUDE "PAequAmulQusgn-MLU2.asm"
 870  A8D8              ;INCLUDE "PAequDustYIdxYmulQ-MLU1.asm"
 871  A8D8              ;INCLUDE "PlanetP12addInwkX-MVT6.asm"
 872  A8D8                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
   1+ A8D8              ;;;LL28:
   2+ A8D8              ;;;    ld      c,a                         ;
   3+ A8D8              ;;;    ld      a,(varQ)                    ;
   4+ A8D8              ;;;    ld      b,a                         ;
   5+ A8D8              ;;;    ld      a,c                         ; Get varQ into b and retain c
   6+ A8D8              ;;;RequAmul256divB:                        ;
   7+ A8D8              ;;;LL28Breg:
   8+ A8D8              ;;;; "BFRDIV R = (A * 256 / Q)  byte from remainder of division, not signed a = a, b = q, c = r"
   9+ A8D8              ;;;	cp		b							; Check A >= Q
  10+ A8D8              ;;;	jr		nc, .AnswerTooBig			; A >= Q? yes too big
  11+ A8D8              ;;;.CalcRemainder:
  12+ A8D8              ;;;	ld		c, 	$FE						; set R to $FE
  13+ A8D8              ;;;.RollRemainder:
  14+ A8D8              ;;;	sla		a
  15+ A8D8              ;;;	jr		c,.Reduce					; if a >> generates carry reduce
  16+ A8D8              ;;;	cp		b							; a < q?
  17+ A8D8              ;;;	jr		nc,.DontSBC
  18+ A8D8              ;;;.DoSBC:									; a is < q
  19+ A8D8              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; 	a -= q
  20+ A8D8              ;;;.DontSBC:
  21+ A8D8              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1
  22+ A8D8              ;;;	jr		c, .RollRemainder			; if rol generated a carry, continue
  23+ A8D8              ;;;    ld      a,c
  24+ A8D8              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  25+ A8D8              ;;;	ret									; R (c) left with remainder
  26+ A8D8              ;;;.Reduce:								; a geneated a carry
  27+ A8D8              ;;;	sbc		a,b							; a = a - (q +1)
  28+ A8D8              ;;;	scf									; set carry flag for rl
  29+ A8D8              ;;;	rl		c							; r << 1 briging in carry
  30+ A8D8              ;;;	jr		c,	.RollRemainder			; if a carry fell off bit 7 then repeat
  31+ A8D8              ;;;    ld      a,c
  32+ A8D8              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  33+ A8D8              ;;;	ret
  34+ A8D8              ;;;.AnswerTooBig:
  35+ A8D8              ;;;	ld	    c,$FF							; arse its too big
  36+ A8D8              ;;;    ld      a,c
  37+ A8D8              ;;;    ld      (varR),a
  38+ A8D8              ;;;	ret
  39+ A8D8
  40+ A8D8              BCequAmul256DivC:
  41+ A8D8 59             ld    e,c
  42+ A8D9 67             ld    h,a
  43+ A8DA 2E 00          ld    l,0
  44+ A8DC              AdivEDivide:                             ; this routine performs the operation BC=HL/E
  45+ A8DC 7B             ld a,e                                 ; checking the divisor; returning if it is zero
  46+ A8DD B7             or a                                   ; from this time on the carry is cleared
  47+ A8DE C8             ret z
  48+ A8DF 01 FF FF       ld bc,-1                               ; BC is used to accumulate the result
  49+ A8E2 16 00          ld d,0                                 ; clearing D, so DE holds the divisor
  50+ A8E4              AdivEDivLoop:                            ; subtracting DE from HL until the first overflow
  51+ A8E4 ED 52          sbc hl,de                              ; since the carry is zero, SBC works as if it was a SUB
  52+ A8E6 03             inc bc                                 ;  note that this instruction does not alter the flags
  53+ A8E7 30 FB          jr nc,AdivEDivLoop                     ; no carry means that there was no overflow
  54+ A8E9 C9             ret
  55+ A8EA
  56+ A8EA              HL_Div_C:
  57+ A8EA              ; Integer divides HL by C
  58+ A8EA              ; Result in HL, remainder in A
  59+ A8EA              ; Clobbers F, B
  60+ A8EA 06 10                ld b,16
  61+ A8EC AF                   xor a
  62+ A8ED              HL_Div_C_Loop:
  63+ A8ED 29                   add hl,hl
  64+ A8EE 17                   rla
  65+ A8EF B9                   cp c
  66+ A8F0 38 02                jr c,HL_DivC_Skip
  67+ A8F2 91                   sub c
  68+ A8F3 2C                   inc l
  69+ A8F4              HL_DivC_Skip:
  70+ A8F4 10 F7                djnz HL_Div_C_Loop
  71+ A8F6 7D                   ld   a,l
  72+ A8F7 32 51 94             ld  (varR),a
  73+ A8FA C9                   ret
  74+ A8FB
  75+ A8FB
  76+ A8FB
  77+ A8FB              ; Entry point if varQ is populated with demoninator
  78+ A8FB              RequAmul256divQ:
  79+ A8FB              BFRDIV:
  80+ A8FB F5           		push	af
  81+ A8FC 3A 50 94     		ld		a,(varQ)
  82+ A8FF 4F           		ld		c,a
  83+ A900 F1           		pop		af
  84+ A901 FE 00        		cp		0
  85+ A903 CA 1A A9     		jp		z, HLDIVC_0_BY	; fast exit if numerator is 0
  86+ A906              RequAmul256divC:
  87+ A906 2E 00        		ld		l,0
  88+ A908 67           		ld		h,a
  89+ A909              HL_Div_Cold:						; fast entry point if C and HL are already set
  90+ A909 06 10        		ld b,16
  91+ A90B AF           		xor a
  92+ A90C              LOOPPOINT:
  93+ A90C 29           		add hl,hl
  94+ A90D 17           		rla
  95+ A90E B9           		cp c
  96+ A90F 38 02        		jr c,SKIPINCSUB
  97+ A911 2C           		inc l
  98+ A912 91           		sub c
  99+ A913              SKIPINCSUB:
 100+ A913 10 F7        		djnz LOOPPOINT
 101+ A915 7D           		ld		a,l
 102+ A916 32 51 94     		ld 		(varR),a
 103+ A919 C9           		ret
 104+ A91A              HLDIVC_0_BY:
 105+ A91A 32 51 94     		ld		(varR),a
 106+ A91D C9           		ret
 107+ A91E              ;	push	af
 108+ A91E              ;	ld		a,b
 109+ A91E              ;	ld		(varQ),a
 110+ A91E              ;	pop		af
 111+ A91E              ;RequAmul256divQ:
 112+ A91E              ;BFRDIV:									;BFRDIV R=A*256/Q   byte from remainder of division
 113+ A91E              ;	ld		hl,varQ
 114+ A91E              ;	JumpIfAGTENusng	(hl),LL2			;  is A >=  Q ?, if yes, answer too big for 1 byte, R=#&FF
 115+ A91E              ;	ld		b,$FE						; b = X
 116+ A91E              ;	ld		c,a							; c = R	div roll counter
 117+ A91E              ;LL31:									; roll R
 118+ A91E              ;	sla		a
 119+ A91E              ;	jr		c,LL29						; hop to Reduce
 120+ A91E              ;	JumpIfALTNusng (hl)					; Q skip sbc if a < Q
 121+ A91E              ;	sbc		a,(hl)						; a = a - Q
 122+ A91E              ;	rl		c							; rotate R left
 123+ A91E              ;	jr		c,LL31						; loop if R poped out a carry bit
 124+ A91E              ;	jr		LL2Good
 125+ A91E              ;LL29:									; Reduce
 126+ A91E              ;	sbc		a,(hl)
 127+ A91E              ;	scf
 128+ A91E              ;	rl		c							; roll a carry flag into R
 129+ A91E              ;	jr		c,LL31						;  loop R
 130+ A91E              ;	jr		LL2Good
 131+ A91E              ;LL2:
 132+ A91E              ;	ld		c,$FF
 133+ A91E              ;LL2Good:
 134+ A91E              ;	ld		a,c
 135+ A91E              ;	ld		(varR),a
 136+ A91E              ;	ret
 137+ A91E
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAmul256divQ-BFRDIV.asm
 873  A91E                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm
   1+ A91E              RequAdivQ:
   2+ A91E              	; R = A/Q, U = remainder, code looked a little odd as if R is reminader and U = result
   3+ A91E              LL61:										; Handling division R=A/Q for case further down
   4+ A91E 4F           	ld		c,a								; c = A
   5+ A91F 3A 50 94     	ld		a,(varQ)						; test for divide by 0
   6+ A922 FE 00        	cp		0
   7+ A924 28 16        	jr		z,LL84							; divide by zero error
   8+ A926 57           	ld		d,a								; now we can do C/D
   9+ A927 06 08            ld b,8
  10+ A929 AF               xor a
  11+ A92A              LL63:										; roll divide loop
  12+ A92A CB 21            sla c
  13+ A92C 17               rla
  14+ A92D BA               cp d
  15+ A92E 38 02            jr c,LL64
  16+ A930 0C               inc c
  17+ A931 92               sub d
  18+ A932              LL64:
  19+ A932 10 F6            djnz LL63
  20+ A934 32 4F 94     	ld	(varU),a							; store remainder in U
  21+ A937 79           	ld	a,c
  22+ A938 32 51 94     	ld	(varR),a							; store remainder in R
  23+ A93B C9               ret
  24+ A93C              LL84:										; div error  R=U=#5
  25+ A93C 3E 32        	ld		a,50
  26+ A93E 32 51 94     	ld		(varR),a
  27+ A941 32 4F 94     	ld		(varU),a
  28+ A944 C9           	ret
  29+ A945
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/RequAdivQ-LL61.asm

  32+ A9C5
  33+ A9C5              TidySub1:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
  34+ A9C5              		; b = regX on entry
  35+ A9C5              TIS1Prep:									;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
  36+ A9C5 08           		ex		af,af'
  37+ A9C6 78           		ld		a,b
  38+ A9C7 32 50 94     		ld		(varQ),a
  39+ A9CA 08           		ex		af,af'
  40+ A9CB EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  41+ A9CD CD 8D A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  42+ A9D0              ; USES 				A BC E
  43+ A9D0              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  44+ A9D0              Tis1Div96:							   		; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  45+ A9D0 4F           		ld		c,a							; Store sign bit in  ct (we use e reg for that)
  46+ A9D1 E6 80        		and		SignOnly8Bit						; ..
  47+ A9D3 5F           		ld		e,a							; ..
  48+ A9D4 79           		ld		a,c							; a = high byte again with sign bit cleared
  49+ A9D5 E6 7F        		and		SignMask8Bit							; ..
  50+ A9D7 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						; slide counter T1
  51+ A9D9              TIS1RollTLoop								; roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  52+ A9D9 CB 27        		sla		a
  53+ A9DB              		JumpIfALTNusng $60, TIS1SkipSub
  53+ A9DB FE 60       >                        cp      $60
  53+ A9DD DA EA A9    >                        jp		c,TIS1SkipSub
  54+ A9E0 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							; subtract 96
  55+ A9E2 37           		scf
  56+ A9E3 CB 10        		rl		b							;  T1
  57+ A9E5 38 F2        		jr		c,TIS1RollTLoop
  58+ A9E7              TIS1KIPCont:
  59+ A9E7 78           		ld		a,b							;   T1
  60+ A9E8 B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  61+ A9E9 C9           		ret
  62+ A9EA              TIS1SkipSub:
  63+ A9EA B7           	or			a
  64+ A9EB CB 10        	rl			b							; T rolled left to push bit out the end
  65+ A9ED 38 EA        	jr			c,TIS1RollTLoop				; if we still have not hit the empty marker continue
  66+ A9EF C3 E7 A9     	jp			TIS1KIPCont
  67+ A9F2
  68+ A9F2              ;.TIDY	\ -> &4679 \ Orthogonalize rotation matrix that uses 0x60 as unity returns INWK(16,18,20) = INWK(12*18+14*20, 10*16+14*20, 10*16+12*18) / INWK(10,12,14)
  69+ A9F2              ; Ux,Uy,Uz = -(FyUy+FzUz, FxUx+FzUz, FxUx+FyUy)/ Fx,Fy,Fz
  70+ A9F2
  71+ A9F2
  72+ A9F2
  73+ A9F2
  74+ A9F2              TidyRotYSmall:
  75+ A9F2 CD 1B AB     		call	CalcRoofvZ
  76+ A9F5 32 1F C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1),a			; set roofvy hi?? Says roofz TODO
  77+ A9F8 C3 2C AA     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  78+ A9FB
  79+ A9FB              TidyRotXSmall:
  80+ A9FB AF           		xor		a
  81+ A9FC 47           		ld		b,a
  82+ A9FD 3A 23 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev_y
  83+ AA00 E6 60        		and		%01100000
  84+ AA02 CA F2 A9     		jp		z,TidyRotYSmall
  85+ AA05 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
  86+ AA08 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
  87+ AA09 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
  88+ AA0C CD E1 AA     		call	CalcRoofvY					; Set (roofvy= (nosev_x * roofv_x + nosev_z * roofv_z) / nosev_y, Q -= nosev_z
  89+ AA0F 32 1D C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1),a			; set roofvy hi
  90+ AA12 C3 2C AA     		jp		NormaliseRoofV
  91+ AA15              TIDY:
  92+ AA15              ORTHOGALISE:
  93+ AA15              ;-- NormaliseNosev
  94+ AA15 CD 53 A9     		call	CopyRotMatNoseVtoXX15
  95+ AA18 CD 44 A5     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise z hi
  96+ AA1B CD 8C A9     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatNoseV
  97+ AA1E              .CheckNXSmall:
  98+ AA1E 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
  99+ AA21 E6 60        		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 100+ AA23 CA FB A9     		jp		z,TidyRotXSmall
 101+ AA26              .RotXIsBig:
 102+ AA26 CD A7 AA             call	CalcRoofvX
 103+ AA29 32 1B C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1),a    	; set roofvx hi
 104+ AA2C              NormaliseRoofV:
 105+ AA2C CD 66 A9     		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 106+ AA2F CD 44 A5     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 107+ AA32              ;calc sidev x
 108+ AA32 CD 9F A9     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 109+ AA35 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 110+ AA38 32 50 94     		ld		(varQ),a					; q = nosev_y
 111+ AA3B 3A 1F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)	     ;roov z
 112+ AA3E CD 45 A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 113+ AA41 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)		; nosev z
 114+ AA44 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 115+ AA45 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)	    ; roofv y
 116+ AA48 CD C5 A9     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 117+ AA4B                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideXNoNeg
 117+ AA4B A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 117+ AA4C CA 51 AA    >				jp	z,NormSideXNoNeg
 118+ AA4F EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_x
 119+ AA51              NormSideXNoNeg:
 120+ AA51 32 15 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a
 121+ AA54              ;calc sidev y
 122+ AA54 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)			; nosev z
 123+ AA57 32 50 94     		ld		(varQ),a
 124+ AA5A 3A 1B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 125+ AA5D CD 45 A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 126+ AA60 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			        ; nosev x
 127+ AA63 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 128+ AA64 3A 1F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)			; roofv z
 129+ AA67 CD C5 A9     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 130+ AA6A                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideYNoNeg
 130+ AA6A A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 130+ AA6B CA 70 AA    >				jp	z,NormSideYNoNeg
 131+ AA6E EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 132+ AA70              NormSideYNoNeg:
 133+ AA70 32 23 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1),a
 134+ AA73              ;calc sidev z
 135+ AA73 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)			; nosev x
 136+ AA76 32 50 94     		ld		(varQ),a
 137+ AA79 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)			; roofv y
 138+ AA7C CD 45 A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 139+ AA7F 3A 23 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)			; nosev y
 140+ AA82 47           		ld		b,a							; b = regX for now
 141+ AA83 3A 1B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)			; roofv x
 142+ AA86 CD C5 A9     		call	TidySub1					; Set (A ?)= (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, Q -= nosev_z
 143+ AA89                      IfAIsZeroGoto NormSideZNoNeg
 143+ AA89 A7          >				and a   ; cp 0 - changed to and a for optimisation but affects other flags
 143+ AA8A CA 8F AA    >				jp	z,NormSideZNoNeg
 144+ AA8D EE 80        		xor		$80							; flip a to get -sidev_y
 145+ AA8F              NormSideZNoNeg:
 146+ AA8F 32 17 C0     		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a ;TODO SHoudl this be Y??
 147+ AA92              .ClearLoBytes:
 148+ AA92 21 20 C0     		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 149+ AA95 06 09        		ld		b,9
 150+ AA97 AF                   xor     a
 151+ AA98              .ClearLoLoop:
 152+ AA98 77           		ld		(hl),a						; zero out lo bytes
 153+ AA99 23           		inc		hl
 154+ AA9A 23           		inc		hl
 155+ AA9B 10 FB        		djnz	.ClearLoLoop
 156+ AA9D CD 79 A9     		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 157+ AAA0 CD 44 A5     		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 158+ AAA3              ;calc sidev x
 159+ AAA3 CD B2 A9     		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 160+ AAA6
 161+ AAA6 C9           		ret
 162+ AAA7
 163+ AAA7
 164+ AAA7
 165+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;.CheckNYSmall:
 166+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+2)					; first check z zero, if so we have to do Y
 167+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		and		$7F
 168+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		cp		0
 169+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ
 170+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(XX15+1)					; now we can do a realistic check of RY
 171+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		cp 		0							; we can't end up with divide by 0 for RY
 172+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RZ					; We can't have all values of vector 0 so we must do RZ
 173+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		and		%01100000					; check top two magnitude bits
 174+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		jp		z,Tidy1RY					; and tidy based on roofy
 175+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;.DoNZ:
 176+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		jp		Tidy1RZ						; else we tidy based on roofz
 177+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;;---RE ENTRY POINT -------------------------------------
 178+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseRoofv:
 179+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 180+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 181+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 182+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 183+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 184+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;ProcessSidev:
 185+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV X
 186+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	nosev_z+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 187+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 188+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 189+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 190+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 191+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 192+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 193+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 194+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 195+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 196+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 197+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 198+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Y
 199+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 200+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 201+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 202+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 203+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 204+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 205+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 206+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 207+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 208+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 209+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 210+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_y+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 211+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 212+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 213+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;; -- SIDEV Z
 214+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 215+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 216+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 217+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 218+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 219+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,a
 220+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 221+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 222+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 223+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 224+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		(sidev_z+1),a
 225+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 226+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,sidev_z
 227+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 228+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX
 229+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;NormaliseSideV:
 230+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 231+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 232+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise
 233+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 234+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 235+ AAA7              ;;;;;;;;
 236+ AAA7
 237+ AAA7
 238+ AAA7              CalcRoofvX:
 239+ AAA7              Tidy1RX:										; roofv_x´ = -(nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_x´
 240+ AAA7              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ
 240+ AAA7 3A 25 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 240+ AAAA 32 50 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 241+ AAAD 3A 1F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 242+ AAB0 CD 45 A9     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = nosez hi * roofz hi
 243+ AAB3              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 243+ AAB3 3A 23 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 243+ AAB6 32 50 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 244+ AAB9 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 245+ AABC CD 8D A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; DE = nosey hi * roofy hi + rs
 246+ AABF 7A           		ld		a,d
 247+ AAC0 E6 80        		and 	$80
 248+ AAC2 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 249+ AAC4              ;DEBUG		ld		c,a
 250+ AAC4 3A 21 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)					; get nosev x sign
 251+ AAC7 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 252+ AAC8 E6 80        		and		$80
 253+ AACA FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 254+ AACC FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 255+ AACE 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 256+ AACF E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 257+ AAD1 42           		ld		b,d
 258+ AAD2 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 259+ AAD3 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 260+ AAD4 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 261+ AAD6 CD C6 A3     		call	BC_Div_DE
 262+ AAD9 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh							; get back sign from nosevx
 263+ AADB EE 80        		xor		$80								; flip sign
 264+ AADD E6 80        		and		$80								; keep sign bit only
 265+ AADF B0           		or		b
 266+ AAE0 C9           		ret
 267+ AAE1
 268+ AAE1
 269+ AAE1              CalcRoofvY:
 270+ AAE1              Tidy1RY:										; roofv_y´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_z´ * roofv_z) / nosev_y´
 271+ AAE1              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1,varQ				;                  A        Q              RS
 271+ AAE1 3A 25 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 271+ AAE4 32 50 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 272+ AAE7 3A 1F C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)
 273+ AAEA CD 45 A9     		call	RSequQmulA
 274+ AAED              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 274+ AAED 3A 21 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 274+ AAF0 32 50 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 275+ AAF3 3A 1B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 276+ AAF6 CD 8D A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS
 277+ AAF9 7A           		ld		a,d
 278+ AAFA E6 80        		and 	$80
 279+ AAFC FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 280+ AAFE 3A 23 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)					; get nosev x sign
 281+ AB01 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 282+ AB02 E6 80        		and		$80
 283+ AB04 FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 284+ AB06 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 285+ AB08 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 286+ AB09 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 287+ AB0B 42           		ld		b,d
 288+ AB0C 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 289+ AB0D 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 290+ AB0E 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 291+ AB10 CD C6 A3     		call	BC_Div_DE
 292+ AB13 FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 293+ AB15 EE 80        		xor		$80
 294+ AB17 E6 80        		and		$80
 295+ AB19 B0           		or		b
 296+ AB1A C9           		ret
 297+ AB1B
 298+ AB1B              CalcRoofvZ:
 299+ AB1B              Tidy1RZ:										; roofv_z´ = -(nosev_x´ * roofv_x + nosev_y´ * roofv_y) / nosev_z´
 300+ AB1B              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevY+1,varQ
 300+ AB1B 3A 23 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 300+ AB1E 32 50 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 301+ AB21 3A 1D C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 302+ AB24 CD 45 A9     		call	RSequQmulA						; rs = NOSEy * ROOFy
 303+ AB27              		ldCopyByte UBnkrotmatNosevX+1,varQ
 303+ AB27 3A 21 C0    >               ld       a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 303+ AB2A 32 50 94    >               ld       (varQ),a
 304+ AB2D 3A 1B C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)
 305+ AB30 CD 8D A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS				; de (A,ixl) = NOSEx * ROOFx + RS
 306+ AB33 7A           		ld		a,d
 307+ AB34 E6 80        		and 	$80
 308+ AB36 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a
 309+ AB38 3A 25 C0     		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)					; get nosev x sign
 310+ AB3B 4F           		ld		c,a								; temp save
 311+ AB3C E6 80        		and		$80
 312+ AB3E FD AC        		xor		iyh								; flip from saved multiply sign result
 313+ AB40 FD 67        		ld		iyh,a							; save nosesev sign to iyh
 314+ AB42 79           		ld		a,c								; recover a
 315+ AB43 E6 7F        		and		$7F								; a is unsigned nosev x
 316+ AB45 42           		ld		b,d
 317+ AB46 4B           		ld		c,e								; bc = nosev_y´ * roofv_y + nosev_z´ * roofv_z
 318+ AB47 57           		ld		d,a								; de = nosev x hi
 319+ AB48 1E 00        		ld		e,0
 320+ AB4A CD C6 A3     		call	BC_Div_DE
 321+ AB4D FD 7C        		ld		a,iyh
 322+ AB4F EE 80        		xor		$80
 323+ AB51 E6 80        		and		$80
 324+ AB53 B0           		or		b
 325+ AB54 C9           		ret
 326+ AB55
 327+ AB55
 328+ AB55
 329+ AB55              ;;ProcessSidev:
 330+ AB55              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 331+ AB55              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)				; a = roofv_hi
 332+ AB55              ;;		push	bc
 333+ AB55              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 334+ AB55              ;;		pop		bc
 335+ AB55              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 336+ AB55              ;;		ld		b,a							; set x (b) to value of nosev_z
 337+ AB55              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				; a = roofv_y hi
 338+ AB55              ;;		push	bc
 339+ AB55              ;;		call	TidySub1					; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z TIS1
 340+ AB55              ;;		pop		bc
 341+ AB55              ;;		xor		$80							; sidev_x = -a by flipping sign bit
 342+ AB55              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevX+1),a				; sidev_x = = (nosev_z * roofv_y - nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96
 343+ AB55              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevX+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 344+ AB55              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvZ+1)				;
 345+ AB55              ;;		push	bc
 346+ AB55              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12 MULT12
 347+ AB55              ;;		pop		bc
 348+ AB55              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevZ+1)
 349+ AB55              ;;		ld		b,a
 350+ AB55              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevY+1)
 351+ AB55              ;;		push	bc
 352+ AB55              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 353+ AB55              ;;		pop		bc
 354+ AB55              ;;		xor		$80							; a *= -1
 355+ AB55              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevY+1),a				; sidev_y  = (nosev_x * roofv_z - nosev_z * roofv_x) / 96
 356+ AB55              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 357+ AB55              ;;		push	bc
 358+ AB55              ;;		ldCopyByte	UBnkrotmatNosevY+1, varQ         ; use ixh as Q later
 359+ AB55              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvX+1)				;
 360+ AB55              ;;		call	RSequQmulA					; RS = Q * A MULT12
 361+ AB55              ;;		pop		bc
 362+ AB55              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatNosevX+1)
 363+ AB55              ;;		ld		b,a
 364+ AB55              ;;		ld		a,(UBnkrotmatRoofvY+1)
 365+ AB55              ;;		push	bc
 366+ AB55              ;;		call	TidySub1						; set A (-nosev_z * roofv_y + nosev_y * roofv_z) / 96, This also sets Q = nosev_z
 367+ AB55              ;;		pop		bc
 368+ AB55              ;;		xor		$80
 369+ AB55              ;;		ld		(UBnkrotmatSidevZ+1),a
 370+ AB55              ;;		xor		a							; set a = 0 so we can clear orientation low bytes
 371+ AB55              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatSidevZ
 372+ AB55              ;;		ld		b,9							; only on 6 cells (3 x row 0 and row 1)
 373+ AB55              ;;		ld		hl,UBnkrotmatNosevX

 378+ AB55
 379+ AB55
 380+ AB55              ;;;;;;;;;-- Check to see if the top two magnitude bits are clear in nosev_x, if so jump to TI1
 381+ AB55              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessRoofv:
 382+ AB55              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatRoofVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 383+ AB55              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 384+ AB55              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 385+ AB55              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 386+ AB55              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatRoofV		; get back normalised version
 387+ AB55              ;;;;;;;;.ProcessSidev:
 388+ AB55              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyRotMatSideVtoXX15		; xx15 = roofv
 389+ AB55              ;;;;;;;;		push	bc
 390+ AB55              ;;;;;;;;		call	normaliseXX1596fast			; normalise roof
 391+ AB55              ;;;;;;;;		pop		bc
 392+ AB55              ;;;;;;;;		call	CopyXX15toRotMatSideV		; get back normalised version
 393+ AB55
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/tidy.asm
 878  AB55                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
   1+ AB55
   2+ AB55              LL28Amul256DivD:        JumpIfAGTENusng  d, .Ll28Exit255
   2+ AB55 BA          >                        cp     d
   2+ AB56 D2 74 AB    >                        jp		nc,.Ll28Exit255
   3+ AB59 1E FE                                ld      e,%11111110                 ; Set R to have bits 1-7 set, so we can rotate through 7
   4+ AB5B CB 27        .LL31:                  sla     a
   5+ AB5D 38 0D                                jr      c,.LL29
   6+ AB5F                                      JumpIfALTNusng  d, .SkipSub         ; will jump if carry set, so we need to reset on the rol
   6+ AB5F BA          >                        cp      d
   6+ AB60 DA 65 AB    >                        jp		c,.SkipSub
   7+ AB63 92                                   sub     d
   8+ AB64                                      ClearCarryFlag                      ; reset clarry as it will be complimented for rotate as 6502 does carry flags inverted
   8+ AB64 B7          >                        or a
   9+ AB65 3F           .SkipSub:               ccf                                 ; if we did the subtract the carry will be clear so we need to invert to roll in.
  10+ AB66 CB 13                                rl      e
  11+ AB68 38 F1                                jr      c,.LL31
  12+ AB6A 7B                                   ld      a,e
  13+ AB6B C9                                   ret
  14+ AB6C 92           .LL29:                  sub     d                           ; A >= Q, so set A = A - Q
  15+ AB6D 37                                   scf                                 ; Set the C flag to rotate into the result in R
  16+ AB6E CB 13                                rl      e                           ; rotate counter e left
  17+ AB70 38 E9                                jr      c,.LL31                     ; if a bit was spat off teh end then loop
  18+ AB72 7B                                   ld      a,e                         ; stick result in a
  19+ AB73 C9                                   ret
  20+ AB74 3E FF        .Ll28Exit255:           ld  a,255                           ; Fail with FF as result
  21+ AB76 C9                                   ret
  22+ AB77
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/LL28AequAmul256DivD.asm
 879  AB77                  INCLUDE "./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm"
# file opened: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
   1+ AB77              XAequMinusXAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1  X.A =  (-X*A  + (R.S))/96
   2+ AB77              TIS1:
   3+ AB77 08           		ex		af,af'
   4+ AB78 3A E2 93     		ld		a,(regX)
   5+ AB7B 47           		ld		b,a
   6+ AB7C 08           		ex		af,af'
   7+ AB7D              BAequMinusBAplusRSdiv96:					;.TIS1	\ -> &293B  \ Tidy subroutine 1 using B register = X
   8+ AB7D 08           		ex		af,af'
   9+ AB7E 78           		ld		a,b
  10+ AB7F 32 50 94     		ld		(varQ),a
  11+ AB82 08           		ex		af,af'
  12+ AB83 EE 80        		xor		$80							;	 flip sign of Acc
  13+ AB85 CD 8D A1     		call	madXAequQmulAaddRS			; \ MAD \ multiply and add (X,A) =  -X*A  + (R,S)
  14+ AB88              ; USES 				A BC E
  15+ AB88              ; DOES NOT USE		D HL
  16+ AB88              Div96:										; .DVID96	\ Their comment A=A/96: answer is A*255/96
  17+ AB88 47           		ld		b,a
  18+ AB89 E6 80        		and		$80							;	hi sign
  19+ AB8B 5F           		ld		e,a							;   e = varT
  20+ AB8C 78           		ld		a,b
  21+ AB8D E6 7F        		and		$7F							;	hi A7
  22+ AB8F 06 FE        		ld		b,$FE						;   slide counter
  23+ AB91 48           		ld		c,b							;   c == T1 ::  T1
  24+ AB92              .DVL3:										;   roll T1  clamp Acc to #96 for rotation matrix unity
  25+ AB92 CB 27        		sla		a
  26+ AB94 FE 60        		cp		$60							; max 96
  27+ AB96 30 02        		jr		nc,.DV4
  28+ AB98 DE 60        		sbc		a,$60							;  SBC #&60
  29+ AB9A              .DV4:										; skip subtraction
  30+ AB9A CB 11        		rl		c							;  T1
  31+ AB9C 38 F4        		jr		c,.DVL3
  32+ AB9E 79           		ld		a,c							;   T1
  33+ AB9F B3           		or		e							;   restore T sign
  34+ ABA0 C9           		ret
  35+ ABA1
# file closed: ./Maths/Utilities/XAequMinusXAPplusRSdiv96-TIS1.asm
